title: Dental Implants - Smile On Clinics
content: Full Arch Restoration with Dental Implants. Replace your teeth and transform your smile. Do you want to improve your smile? The TEETH ON IMPLANTS® dental implant system is a dental technique that can offer a long-lasting solution to missing teeth. The treatment involves supporting all teeth on multiple implants, making them look, feel and function just like natural teeth. The procedure is particularly suitable for patients who may have missing, decayed or broken/chipped teeth. Available at 30+ Smile On Clinics How Teeth On Implants® can enhance your smile Teeth On Implants® is a complete oral rehabilitation that can give you natural looking teeth and allow you to speak, smile and laugh with renewed confidence. Read More Why Living with Missing Teeth Can Be Challenging and What Can Be Done About It Dental implants have proven to be a revolutionary solution for individuals struggling with missing teeth. Whether you are dealing with a single missing tooth or need to replace multiple teeth, this advanced dental treatment can make it easier for you to eat, speak, and smile with confidence. At Smile On Clinics, we are highly experienced in dental implant procedures that are designed to feel and function just like natural teeth while offering a long-lasting solution to tooth loss. Missing teeth can cause a range of problems that can affect people both physically and emotionally. Beyond the obvious cosmetic concerns, missing teeth can lead to difficulty in eating, speaking, and maintaining proper oral hygiene. The gaps left by missing teeth can become infected, and teeth can shift out of place over time as there is one less root to support them. This can result in more dental issues, such as bite problems, jaw discomfort, and an increased risk of gum disease. Multiple missing teeth can lead to significant changes in the structure of your mouth, making it difficult to chew food properly and affecting your appearance. Full mouth dental implants are a solution that helps restore the structure of your mouth and give you a more youthful and attractive smile. One of the main reasons people avoid addressing missing teeth is the perceived high cost of dental implants. However, when considering the long-term benefits, such as improved oral health, increased self-esteem, and a lasting, natural-looking smile, the investment in dental implants is well worth it. Dental implants provide a solution to tooth loss by replacing both the missing tooth root and the tooth itself. They are placed directly into the jawbone, and as a result, they are a lot more stable than dentures or bridges. This helps to preserve the structure of the surrounding teeth and bone, ensuring that you can maintain optimum oral health and functionality. What to Expect During the Dental Implant Procedure The dental implant procedure involves several steps. Firstly, our skilled team will assess how healthy your gums, jaw, and remaining teeth are so they can develop the best treatment plan for you. In cases where the jawbone isn’t strong enough to support an implant, bone grafting may be recommended to strengthen it beforehand. Once the necessary preparations are complete, the dental implant is placed into the jawbone during a minor surgical procedure. After the implant has been put in, it takes several months for the bone to fully fuse with the implant. Once this process is complete, we will attach a custom crown, bridge, or denture to the implant to restore your smile and aid speech and eating. For patients who are missing a full set of teeth, we offer full mouth dental implants, which can be used to replace both the upper and lower teeth. This comprehensive treatment can transform your entire smile. However, you should be aware that results can differ between patients, and your dentist will be able to let you know if you’re a strong candidate for this cosmetic procedure. Dental implant surgery is typically performed under local anaesthesia to ensure that the procedure is as comfortable and pain-free as possible. The procedure may take a few hours, depending on how complex the process turns out to be. After the surgery, you might experience some swelling or discomfort, but don’t worry, this is normal and can be managed with prescribed medications and proper post-surgical care. Recovery time varies, but most patients can resume normal activities within a few days. It is important to follow all post-operative instructions to give yourself the best chance to heal quickly, reduce complications, and ensure long-term success of your dental implants. Regular follow-up appointments will be scheduled to monitor progress and ensure that your implants are properly integrating with your jawbone. What is Bone Grafting, and Why is it Necessary? Bone grafting is a procedure where bone material is added to the jaw to promote regrowth. This is often necessary when there is insufficient bone to fuse to dental implants. This can occur due to bone loss caused by factors like gum disease, ageing, or tooth loss over a long period of time. Bone grafting can help to improve the overall outcome of implant treatments for some patients. Replacing Missing Teeth with Natural-Looking Results Dental implants are designed to look and function just like natural teeth. The replacement teeth are made to match the original size, shape, and colour of your existing teeth, so they give you a polished and natural appearance, regardless of whether you’re replacing a single missing tooth or a full set. In addition to their natural appearance, dental implants offer a range of benefits compared to other cosmetic treatment options. Unlike dentures, which can come loose or cause discomfort, dental implants are securely attached to the jawbone, providing a stable and comfortable solution. The Importance of Maintaining Healthy Surrounding Teeth When replacing missing teeth with dental implants, it’s important to remember that the success of the procedure can be affected if the health and condition of the surrounding teeth are poor. It may be necessary to address these issues before proceeding with implant surgery. In cases where gum disease is detected, treatment may be required to ensure that the gums and surrounding tissues are healthy enough to support the implants. At Smile On Clinic, we provide comprehensive care to deal with any underlying dental issues, such as gum disease, before we recommend going ahead with any cosmetic procedures. How Much Do Dental Implants Cost? A question we hear most frequently at Smile On Clinic is, “How much do dental implants cost?” While they are often more expensive upfront compared to dentures or bridges, it’s important to look at the long-term value they provide. Dental implants are not just a band-aid to temporarily resolve a problem; they’re designed to be permanent, durable, and low maintenance, making them a smart, cost-effective solution over time. When maintained properly, dental implants can last for decades, and they help preserve jawbone health and the functionality of surrounding teeth, which can reduce the need for extra treatments in the future. Unlike temporary options, they do not shift, wear down adjacent teeth, or need to be frequently replaced. You’ll be able to save money, time, and a world of pain in the future. At Smile On Clinic, we offer transparent pricing, without any hidden costs or surprises. Every smile is different, and so are the treatment needs and costs. During your consultation, we will assess your oral health and provide a detailed breakdown of all associated costs, including: The number of implants needed (single, multiple, or full mouth dental implants) Any preparatory procedures (like tooth extraction or bone grafting) The type of restoration (crowns, bridges, or dentures) Surgical and laboratory fees Post-operative care and follow-up appointments. We believe that high-quality care should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their income, which is why we offer a range of financing options for all budgets. Whether you need one dental implant or a complete smile makeover, our team will guide you through every step with clarity and compassion for your situation. At Smile On Clinic, we understand how challenging living without natural teeth can be. Our experienced team provides personalised dental implant solutions, whether you’re replacing a single tooth, several teeth, or need a full set. We use cutting-edge technology to deliver the highest standard of care. Our modern techniques allow us to implant teeth with precision and stability, giving you results that look and feel completely natural. We’re dedicated to helping you restore your smile and dental functions. Contact us today to schedule a consultation and explore your options for a better quality of life. Read Less Single and multiple dental implantsWhether you require multiple implants or a single implant, our dental implant experts are here to help you to get the smile you deserve. Teeth On Implants® Benefits Speak with confidence Aim for minimal pain during treatment Look and feel like natural teeth Long-lasting solutions for single or multiple missing teeth Efficient treatment & recovery time Minimal maintenance Warranty provided on both prosthetics and implants for up to 10 years with regular maintenance Conservative surgical approaches Help prevent further bone loss associated with missing teeth 8 Reasons Why Teeth On Implants® is the preferred implant option 1. Performed by qualified implant experts Local dental implant experts, Dr Ned Restom, Dr David Bassal and their teams have completed extensive training specifically in Teeth On Implants® and smile design. They are highly qualified and experienced in the area and are aware of all the contributing factors that are necessary to provide exceptional results for you and your smile. 2. Comfortable surgery With Teeth On Implants® you can enjoy a comfortable dental experience above all else. The procedure could be performed under sedation or general anesthetics in a private hospital. We also follow a thorough medication regime that will ensure minimal discomfort. 3. Digital Smile Design prior to treatment Before your procedure you can view exactly what your new smile will look like and work together with your dentist to codesign your beautiful new smile. 4. Most advanced technology With the latest in implant design and scanning technology, Teeth On Implants® work with world leaders in teeth and titanium bar designs that fit perfectly, every time. 5. Not just ALL On 4 With Teeth On Implants® you can get as many implants as you require to ensure your full arch is secure, and at no additional cost. The Teeth On Implants® protocol has improved on outdated modes by enhancing your treatment, through the addition of more implants we aim for an outcome that is more sturdy – standing the test of time. 6. No unsightly gap Unlike other implant approaches, with Teeth On Implants® you will have no gap at the gum line giving you a more comfortable fit – thanks to our cutting-edge digital scanning methods. 7. Material diversity With the evolution of stronger, more lifelike materials – Teeth On Implants® offers you a material solution recreating your smile that is a class above the rest. 8. Bone grafting Teeth On Implants® believes in giving you the best option every time, unlike other methods there is no extra charge for bone grafting to increase bone volumes for the longevity of your smile! Teeth On Implants® Treatment Price Guide For the cost of Teeth On Implants® to replace a full set of upper or lower teeth, see pricing guide tables below. This is using a standard process involving an initial provisional set of teeth constructed using a denture-like prosthesis adapted over the dental implant, performed to high-quality standards by highly experienced and qualified implant dentists. Your dental implant expert is here to guide you Every patient is slightly different and has unique needs and it is impossible to ascertain suitability or the exact treatment or cost without an assessment by one of our dental implant experts. Payment plan options are available We understand that dental treatment can be costly, and we believe that everyone deserves to get the smile of their dreams which is why we offer a range of payment plan options. Our friendly team can run you through these during your consultation. Want to take the next step towards getting the smile you deserve? Book a consultation today! content: Creating beautiful smiles and transforming lives Are you embarrassed to show your smile? Co-design your new smile with your dentist Our team strongly believes that everyone, no matter who they are, deserves a beautiful, healthy smile. Smile Makeovers and cosmetic dentistry is now readily accessible for almost anyone who is unhappy with the appearance of their smile or teeth. Focusing on cosmetic and implant dentistry our highly experienced and skilled dentists are some of the most respected and reputable dental practitioners in Australia. Because everyone deserves a beautiful smile! We look forward to helping you to improve your smile and quality of life. Design your new smile with a dentist near you today! Digital Smile Design Digital Smile Design enables patients to visualize the end result prior to having the procedure performed. The process involves digital photography and computer-aided design programs to aid dentists with planning cosmetic and restorative dental treatments more reliably, efficiently, and effectively. Allowing patients and dentists to see the final result of the planned procedure improves accuracy, affords the opportunity for modifications and adjustments before the procedure, and results in greater patient satisfaction with the outcome. Teeth Whitening Teeth whitening is a cosmetic procedure that helps to lighten teeth by removing stains and reducing discolouration. You can whiten your teeth with a take-home kit from over the counter, however, it won’t be as effective as an in-chair treatment. In-chair treatments lead to more effective results without damaging your tooth enamel. In addition, results are visible instantaneously. Invisalign Invisalign is the virtually invisible and hygienic dental treatment that uses a series of custom-made, clear, removable aligners that gradually align the teeth. Unlike traditional braces and retainers, Invisalign works effectively to straighten the teeth without disrupting lifestyle activities. It’s a simple, painless and effective way to transform your smile and ultimately change your life. Dental Veneers Dental veneers are very thin, custom-made shells that are added to the front of a tooth to mask its colour, shape, or positioning in the mouth. Once affixed, veneers appear natural-looking and perfectly complement facial features. Veneers are usually used to replace chipped, cracked, misaligned, or discoloured teeth, or to improve your smile! After braces, this patient was still unhappy with her smile. She finally wanted to get the smile of her dreams before her big day. We trialled several smiles until she was happy with this design. Married with a smile and lived happily ever after! Did you know you can request this exact smile – we can now carbon copy any smile so you can have the smile of your dreams too? Dental Implants The Teeth On Implants® system is a highly effective dental technique that offers a solution to missing teeth. The treatment refers to supporting teeth on multiple implants, making them look, feel and function just like natural teeth. The procedure is particularly suitable for patients who may have missing, decayed or broken/chipped teeth. Our Cosmetic Dentistry Locations Central Coast Burwood Concord Erina Forster Manly Maroochydore Mona Vale Newport Northern Beaches Sunshine Coast Swansea Tamworth Taree Book a consultation today! A Cosmetic Dentistry Clinic You Can Trust If you are looking for cosmetic dental services in Sydney, the Central Coast and the Hunter, regional NSW and the Sunshine Coast, then you have come to the right place. Here at Smile On, we’ve helped countless clients to achieve a bright, full, and most importantly, healthy smile. Feeling self-conscious about your smile? Don’t spend another day shying away and hiding your teeth at every opportunity. Simply get in touch with our team and we’ll create a bespoke treatment plan that achieves the results that you’re looking for. By the time you leave our clinic, you will be beaming from ear to ear. You’ll find our services across many cities and areas, so no matter where you are located, treatment is accessible. Whether you are based in Manly or Mona Vale, the Northern Beaches or the Sunshine Coast, or anywhere in between, we have you covered. Design a smile that you’re proud to show off with Smile On. What to Expect from Your Treatment We are local leaders here at Smile On and for good reason. Clients choose our cosmetic dentistry clinic time and time again for the quality of our treatments and the quality of our support. Here’s what you can expect from your treatment. Tailored solutions We understand that your teeth are unique and so is your treatment which is why we offer tailored treatment solutions that cater to your exact needs. A personalised plan is the only effective solution that will ensure the health of your teeth while achieving the goals that you’ve set for your treatment. In your initial consultation, we’ll listen to your wants, needs, goals and budget before tailoring the best solution, whether that’s a single treatment or a full smile makeover. Comfort Dental anxiety can be severe. And even if you don’t have a fear, it’s natural to feel apprehensive about treatment. But rest assured that your comfort is our highest priority here at Smile On. From the welcoming environment of our clinics to the warmth of our dentists, we aim to put your mind at ease from day one. And if you have any worries or concerns, don’t hesitate to raise these with our team. We’ll always answer with honesty. Payment plans We believe that a healthy and radiant smile should be accessible and affordable for all, which is why we offer payment plans on our treatments. From as little as $100 per week, you can fix both minor and major imperfections and create the smile that you deserve. For more information, speak to our team at your initial consultation. Comprehensive Treatment Plans to Suit Your Needs We offer a comprehensive selection of services that we combine to achieve your goals. So no matter whether you are looking for teeth whitening in Burwood, dental veneers in Newport, dental crowns in Tamworth or other, we have you covered. Teeth Whitening How often have you looked at your smile in the mirror and wished your teeth were just a few shades lighter? Don’t worry, we’ve all been there. Yellowing and staining is inevitable over time and it’s impossible to avoid all of the food and drink products that lead to such discolouration. But that doesn’t mean you have to settle for it. Lighten the shade of your teeth with our teeth whitening treatment. Available as a standalone treatment or combined with other cosmetic dentistry options. Dental Veneers If your teeth are heavily stained, uneven, misaligned or chipped, dental veneers are a great choice of treatment. Our team will custom-make thin shells to cover your existing teeth, and the result? Consistency in colour, consistency in size and consistency in shape. From a single veneer to multiple, our team have you covered. And we’ll match your veneers to any existing teeth for a natural-looking finish. Strong, durable, and long lasting, you will enjoy transformation results for decades with the right aftercare. Dental Crowns A similar solution to veneers, a dental crown also sits atop your existing tooth. We recommend dental crowns if you suffer from broken, cracked, chipped or otherwise damaged teeth. Adding strength as well as improving the appearance, clients love the results that dental crowns achieve. And you can count on our team to match the colour, size and shape to your natural teeth for optimal results. Don’t let minor problems become major issues by leaving your damage untreated. Get in touch with our experts as soon as damage occurs for best results. Dental Implants Do you struggle with missing teeth? Perhaps you have a temporary fix such as removable dentures? For a solution, we recommend a dental implant. As strong as, if not stronger than a natural tooth, implants are fixed into your jawline and topped with a dental crown for strength, durability and a realistic finish. Don’t spend time and effort on maintaining temporary dentures and cleaning the space where your tooth would sit. Discover why our dental implants are a worthwhile investment by getting in touch with our team. Optimise Your Smile with Cosmetic Dentistry Solutions A dazzling smile is much more than a look. It’s a symbol of joy that comes from within and shouldn’t be something you have to shy away from. To improve the appearance of your teeth and restore confidence in your smile, our cosmetic dentists have you covered. As experts in both general and cosmetic dentistry, we’ll achieve a radiant yet healthy smile. And when you feel confident in your smile, it shows. Raising dopamine, serotonin and endorphin levels, it’s been scientifically proven that smiling can boost your mood and happiness level. Don’t risk lowering your mood by shying away from your smile. Simply reach out to one of our clinics with your needs and we’ll do the rest. From day one through treatment and into aftercare, you are in safe hands. Based in Burwood, Concord, Erina, Forster, Manly, Maroochydore, Mona Vale, Newport, Northern Beaches, Sunshine Coast, Swansea, Tamworth and Taree, our clinics are accessible for all in the region. We look forward to hearing from you soon. title: Digital Smile Design and Cosmetic I Smile On Clinics | Dental Implants
content: Want to see what your smile will look like before dental treatment? Well guess what you can with Digital Smile Design! What is Digital Smile Design? Digital Smile Design (DSD) is an advanced dental cosmetic treatment that allows patients to design their own smiles. This procedure allows patients to see what their new smile will look like before they commence treatment. This will give them peace of mind and the assurance that they will be getting the best smile that suits them. What is the Digital Smile Design Process? Our highly experienced and skilled dentists will take photos, X-rays, and digital impressions of your mouth. Firstly, a video of you talking and smiling will be recorded from different angles which will help you to decide on the final result. Amazing, isn’t it? Secondly, the data is entered into the Digital Smile Design software which will then generate a digital library of smiles that will be placed over your teeth giving you an example of the treatment results. Your Dental practitioner will then conduct a smile design analysis. Working alongside ceramists, dental technicians and specialists who will help you achieve your dream smile. After that, we will generate a mock-up of the final result. This will give you a chance to make any last-minute adjustments to the tooth length, colour, and smile shape. After this, you’ll be able to approve the design and the treatment plan. Finally, treatment begins and it’s time to get the smile of your dreams! Is this procedure painful? We understand that dental procedures can be daunting. That’s why our friendly and caring team will explain the entire treatment plan in full detail. This allows our patients to voice any concerns they may have. In general, the use of technology and digital diagnostic tools means that Digital Smile Design is a non-invasive procedure. We also count on many sedation options for the actual dental treatment itself. Book a Consultation today! title: Smile On Straighter | Smile On Clinics |
content: Smile On Straighter is an innovative procedure that straightens the teeth without the use of braces. It uses of a series of clear, removable aligners, specifically crafted to fit your teeth, which you change every two weeks. Over time, the aligners gently and slowly shift the teeth into the proper position. A smarter, faster, more comfortable way to straighten your teeth Ever wished for a straighter smile but put it off because of cost, hassle, or discomfort? Now, there’s a better way—without bulky metal braces or frequent dentist visits. Introducing Smile On Straighter—our breakthrough clear aligner technology designed for real results, ultimate comfort, and total convenience. Ask a Question Enquiries – Regions Full Name Phone Email Post Code Region Select your region Central Coast Newcastle & Hunter Sydney Dubbo Griffith Port Stephens Taree Tuncurry Sunshine Coast Northern Beaches Jervis Bay Tamworth Lake Macquarie Canberra Coffs Harbour Armidale Wollongong Wagga Wagga Cootamundra Penrith Kotara Tuggerah Practice Choose a practice How did you hear about us How did you hear about us?Search Engine (Google, Bing, etc.)Social Media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.)Recommended by Friend or ColleagueBlog or PublicationOther How did you hear about us Message Captcha Send If you are human, leave this field blank. Why Choose Smile On Straighter? Unlike traditional braces or generic aligners, Smile On Straighter is built on cutting-edge orthodontic expertise and real expert-led treatment to guarantee the best outcome. Virtually Invisible Aligners – Discreet, stain-resistant, and laser-cut for a precise fit. Faster, More Predictable Results – Most treatments are completed within 6–18 months. Expert-Guided Treatment – Every case is planned by experienced orthodontists, ensuring the best outcome. Fewer Office Visits – Weekly digital check-ins allow progress to be monitored remotely, saving you time. A Sustainable Choice – Our aligners are 100% recyclable, with a lower carbon footprint than traditional treatments. Confidence in Your Results – Backed by our 10-Year Smile Guarantee. Flexible Payment Options – Plans start at just $80 per week, making treatment accessible without surprises or hidden fees. A Smarter Alternative to Traditional Braces Traditional braces are effective but can be uncomfortable, difficult to clean, and highly visible. Smile On Straighter aligners offer a comfortable, low-maintenance solution while delivering proven, lasting results. Removable for Easy Cleaning – No wires or brackets to get in the way. No Food Restrictions – Eat what you love without worrying about damage. Designed for Comfort – Custom fit reduces irritation to gums and soft tissue. Less Time in the Chair – Smart monitoring means fewer in-office visits. What to Expect on Your Smile Journey Step 1 – Book a Consultation Visit your nearest Smile On Clinic for an in-depth consultation to assess your needs. Step 2 – Get a Personalized Treatment Plan Using advanced 3D imaging, we’ll create a tailored aligner plan and even show you a preview of your future smile before treatment begins. Step 3 – Start Your Journey with Confidence Wear your custom aligners as instructed. Track your progress weekly through smart remote monitoring. Enjoy a smooth, comfortable treatment with fewer disruptions to your daily routine. Why Patients Trust Smile On Straighter With over 31 expert Dentists and 25+ convenient locations, Smile On is a trusted provider of clear aligner treatment in Australia. As part of the Australasian Implant Academy, we combine advanced technology with expert care to ensure each patient receives the best possible treatment for their individual needs. See Your Future Smile Today We understand that committing to treatment is a big decision. That’s why we offer a free digital Smile Preview—allowing you to see what your new smile could look like before you begin. Find your nearest Smile On Clinic to get started. All treatment images and videos are of Smile On Clinics patients and are shared with consent. No filters, AI editing or artificial lighting enhancements have been used. Results vary between individuals. Outcomes, risks, complications, and recovery times vary for each person and procedure. Treatment results cannot be guaranteed. This information is general in nature and is not medical advice. Before starting any treatment, please seek personalised guidance from a qualified, AHPRA-registered health practitioner. We always encourage considering a second opinion. title: Dental Sedation & Sleep Dentistry | Smile On Clinics
content: Does the very thought of a dental procedure make you anxious? You are certainly not alone; in fact, a significant percentage of people experience dental fear and anxiety. Our team at Smile On Clinics practices can help you with your dental anxiety and are committed to ensuring your experience is as comfortable and stress free as possible. Sleep Dental Clinics and Sedation can help anxious patients Having dental treatment while you are asleep is known as Sleep Dentistry and may also be referred to as Dental Sedation, Sleep Sedation, Twilight Sedation and Sedation Dentistry involves IV sedation and anaesthesia to induce sleep and reduce pain, awareness and recollection during dental procedures. In this way, it alleviates the fear, anxiety and discomfort that may often be associated with general and paediatric dentistry. Sedation dentistry allows patients to feel at ease and comfortable when undergoing treatment. Some dental patients are apprehensive and anxious when they are having treatment. We understand that this may be a deterrent for many patients. By easily accommodating our patients with sedation, patients can complete their treatment plans with confidence. In-chair professional sedation services For patients wanting to have all treatment performed at the dental practice, we regularly perform surgical procedures in the dental chair using sedation and sleep dentistry techniques. This will make your dental treatment nice and smooth. No procedure is too small for this process. If you are a patient who is too anxious to have a dental clean, then sedation can definitely help you. The most common procedures performed under dental sedation are: Wisdom teeth extractions Tooth extractions Fillings Implants However, any dental procedure can be performed. General anaesthetic at the private hospital Some patients prefer to be completely under for surgical procedures, and we are pleased to be able to offer such an option. We also have highly complex cases where we recommend treatment to be completed under general anaesthetic. General anaesthetic facilities are available at Brisbane, allowing us to deliver quality dental surgery – including full arch rehab (we perform this weekly) and implants almost every day! Patients can then also receive the amazing aftercare that the lovely nurses at Brisbane Waters Private Hospital provide. If you have been putting off dental treatment because you are anxious or worried about pain, don’t be. We have the ideal solution to suit your individual requirements and ensure your experience is as comfortable and pain-free as possible. Are you anxious about dental treatment and would like our team to help you to smile again? title: General Dentistry | Smile On Clinics
content: General Dentistry Our caring and experienced dentists provide a wide range of general dentistry treatments that are designed to keep your teeth and mouth healthy and happy. What is general dentistry? General dentistry is a range of services that are concerned with the prevention and restoration of your oral health. From check-ups, scaling and cleaning teeth, fluoride treatments and restorations to crowns/bridges and tooth extractions, our friendly dentists are the first line of defence against dental disease. Your mouth can reveal findings of additional systemic problems or diseases which can impact your overall health. As part of your comprehensive oral examination, your dentist will make a record of the findings which involves a comprehensive oral mucosal examination (oral cancer check), a full charting of your existing oral condition, treatment planning, and radiographs (x-rays) and photographs (as required). Your dental professional will present you with all the information recorded and discuss your needs with you. Have you had your regular check-up? Book a consultation today! Featured Services Dental Implants Replace missing teeth with durable, natural-looking dental implants that restore functionality and aesthetics. Teeth Whitening Brighten your smile with our professional teeth whitening services for a radiant, confident look. Cosmetic Dentistry Enhance your smile with cosmetic treatments designed to improve your teeth’s appearance and boost confidence. Veneers Correct imperfections and achieve a flawless smile with custom-made veneers. Dental Crowns Restore and protect damaged teeth with high-quality dental crowns tailored to your needs. Teeth Straightening Achieve a beautifully aligned smile with our teeth straightening solutions, including braces and Invisalign. Dentures Replace multiple missing teeth with full or partial dentures, designed for comfort and functionality. Orthodontist for Kids Provide your child with expert orthodontic care for a healthy and properly aligned smile. Dental Chip Repair Quickly repair chipped teeth and restore your smile’s natural beauty and function. Our Team Meet the dedicated professionals behind our practice. Our team of skilled dentists and specialists is committed to delivering exceptional care and ensuring every patient feels comfortable and confident in their smile. With a wealth of experience and a passion for excellence, each team member plays a vital role in making your dental journey a positive one. title: Dentist Burwood | Comprehensive Dental Solutions
content: Shop 17, 11-15 Deane StBurwood NSW 2134 (02) 8069 7945 info@tailoredteeth.com.au tailoredteeth.com.au facebook.com/tailoredteeth instagram.com/tailoredteeth Tailored Teeth provides dental services in Burwood, Sydney, from our new age clinic that uses the latest in digital technologies for your healthcare requirements. Our Mission Is to Provide a Professional & Honest Approach to Health Care. Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 5pm Tuesday: 9am – 5pm Wednesday: 9am – 5pm Thursday: 9am – 5pm Friday: 9am – 5pm Saturday: 9am – 2pm Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Looking For a Dentist in Burwood? Smile On Clinics, trusted Burwood dentist providers, offer a wide range of dental services using the latest in dental technology to help you achieve the results you want. Read More Whether you’re looking for emergency dental treatment to take care of an aching pain or whether you want to enhance your natural teeth with aesthetic veneers, you can find it all at our Burwood dental clinic. When day-to-day life gets hectic, it can be very easy to put off visiting the dentist. However, the longer you go between check-ups, the more opportunity there is for your teeth to cause you trouble. Our friendly and professional team are here to set your mind at ease, incorporating state-of-the-art equipment to help you feel comfortable and cared for. Choosing a Smile On Clinics Burwood dental practice gives you the comforts of a small, local team as well as the benefits of an expanding brand, available across Australia. Our highly experienced team members prioritise the care of our patients, delivering excellence from the moment you walk through the door. What Dental Services Are Available to Burwood Residents? Here at Smile On Clinics, delivering quality dental care is our top priority. To help you maintain good oral health habits, we offer a wide range of dental health services that cover routine dentistry, cosmetic dental enhancements, and emergency assistance wherever necessary. Burwood residents will benefit from the latest technology to assist with corrective procedures such as clear aligners and orthodontic treatment, as well as having the option to choose sedation in cases of dental anxiety. We put our patients’ needs first and aim to keep you as comfortable and as happy as possible throughout your procedure. Services offered include: Children’s dentistry, helping your child to feel confident and proactive about their dental health. Preventative dental care, using our extensive experience to identify potential issues before they become especially concerning. Wisdom tooth extraction. Tooth restoration – chip repair, fillings, crowns, and bridges. Smile On Straighter clear aligners and orthodontic procedures to straighten teeth, using braces or aligners. Dental implants and dentures are tailor-made for you right here in our own Smile On Lab. Exclusive Teeth On Implants, applied by our industry-leading practitioners in this technology. Reference to high-end technology that ensures exceptional dental care from start to finish. General Dentistry Appointments at Burwood Dental Clinic Most general dental appointments are about covering the basics, as an accompaniment to good oral health practice at home. These appointments generally cover an inspection to identify potential concerns at the earliest possible stage, while providing professional cleaning services to keep plaque and other dental issues at bay. As part of your quality dental care, your extensive exam will give a comprehensive analysis of your current oral health and any remedial actions that may help to improve or maintain your current dental health. Your dentist will complete a report, including any x-rays or photographs taken as part of the examination, and will give you access to all recorded information to keep you informed of your health throughout. As a Burwood family dentist, we aim to help children feel at ease throughout their dental appointments, because we understand that positive experiences will help encourage your children to care for their teeth more enthusiastically. We offer children access to similar treatments to adults, including check-ups, professional cleaning and scaling, fluoride treatments, and – if necessary – teeth straightening options. Dental Treatments for Common Dental Concerns In Burwood Another common reason for dental visits centres around dental pain. This pain can be excruciating and begin suddenly, or it may be a ‘background’ pain that is ever present, but you live with it. In either case, it’s always best to visit a dentist when you experience dental pain. In almost every case, there is a reason behind these aches, and the longer you wait to investigate, the worse the situation can become. At Smile On Clinics, we will investigate the source of pain as a priority and make our professional recommendations for a course of treatment to help relieve the pain and protect against future instances. Common treatments can include wisdom tooth removal, and application of fillings and crowns, depending on the source of the issue. In cases where you have a chipped or cracked tooth, we can also rebuild the tooth or apply a veneer to tackle the problem before it requires a more invasive course of treatment to correct. Enhance Your Smile with Our Industry-Leading Orthodontist in Burwood Dentistry isn’t all about general maintenance or combatting painful conditions, it can also be about helping you feel comfortable and confident in your smile. Using digital smile design, a technological game-changer, you can now design your own smile. This puts full control in your hands, allowing you to choose the look that matches your aesthetic, rather than having a dentist choose for you. Whether you want to straighten your teeth using Smile On Straighter clear aligners, utilise selective or full mouth dental implants, or you need a fully reconstructed set of teeth via dentures, we’ll help you every step of the way. To begin, we would complete an extensive analysis of your current dental situation, using x-rays and images, to produce a digital recreation. From there, you’ll work alongside our highly experienced team of dental technicians and specialists to make the adjustments that you want to see in your smile. When your digital smile design is complete and you are fully satisfied with the final version, we’ll work to recreate your carefully curated smile. Our Friendly Dentists in Burwood Give You All the Support You Need Though no one aims for poor dental health, dentist anxiety is real. If you experience this, please let us know so we can give you all the support you require for your dental needs. Part of our commitment to providing exceptional dental care is ensuring that you are as relaxed and as comfortable as possible throughout. If your dental anxiety is very powerful, causing avoidance or even dental neglect, it can lead to compounded dental problems later on. To help you overcome this, we provide a range of options like happy gas, IV sedation or a general anaesthesia service so you can sleep soundly throughout your procedure. This service is popular and allows people to take care of their mental health and their oral health with as minimal disruption as possible. We keep you informed of your information and recommendations throughout, so you can make fully informed decisions at every stage of your dental health journey. Book Your Appointment at Our Burwood Dental Clinic Today Unlike many other dental practices, Smile On Clinics provides you with the care of a local dentist while giving access to the latest technology for exceptional care. We offer a wide variety of services and utilise our own Smile On Lab to create your tailor-made implants. Outsourcing your dental care can lead to miscommunication issues, delays, and other issues that can negatively impact your life. However, we prioritise keeping your care in-house. This means that there are multiple collaboration opportunities, allowing you to benefit from the extensive knowledge of many specialists, all working together as one team. We aim to deliver exceptional care every time you visit. To find out more, or to book your first Smile On Clinics dental appointment, you can send your request through our easy-to-use contact form – we look forward to seeing you soon. title: Dentist Dubbo | Family-Friendly Dental Solutions
content: Shop 2, 1 Torvean AveDubbo NSW 2830 (02) 6882 8819 info@delroyparkdental.com.au www.delroyparkdental.com.au Facebook Instagram As well as being in a convenient location, our practice offers everything from prevention-based care to oral surgery under one roof. Thanks to a family-friendly environment, everyone can access the care they need with the same team of dental providers. From providing implants to children’s checkups and everything between, we have been offering accessible and gentle services in regional NSW for the last 10 years. Opening Hours Monday: 8am – 5pm Tuesday: 8am – 5pm Wednesday: 8am – 5pm Thursday: 8am – 5pm Friday: 8am – 5pm Saturday: 8am – 2pm Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Looking for the Best Dubbo Dental Clinic? Introducing the most trusted Dubbo dentist around! That’s right, we at Smile On Clinics provide comprehensive dental care for all Dubbo residents. Ranging from your everyday check-ups to cosmetic dentistry and dental implants, we have the tools to help you achieve a healthy, award-winning smile. We are aware that visiting the dentist can be daunting for some, which is why we do everything in our power to make you feel as comfortable as possible during your time before, during and after you visit our dental clinic. Who can ask for more?! A Dentist Dubbo Residents Can Rely on Nothing dulls a person’s shine than being insecure about the way they look. If you are not happy with your teeth, then a dentist in Dubbo can support you. Our primary goal here at Smile On Clinics is to help our patients feel comfortable in the skin they’re in, as well as maintain decent oral health. As an independently owned and operated company, we don’t treat our patients as another number through the door, but instead, as individuals with unique dental care requirements. Every mouth is different, so why would we treat them the same?! Our Dubbo dental practice will take the time to understand your goals and will work together with you to create a tailor-made treatment plan during your 1:1 consultation with one of our experts. If you would like to discuss your needs further, please do seek our support via telephone or our ‘Contact us’ function on our website. A High-Tech Dentist in Dubbo If you choose Smile On Clinics for your dental treatments, you’ll no doubt receive exceptional dental care. This is because we utilise the most modern technology available to help our patients achieve their smile goals. Our excellent digital smile design enables us to show you what your teeth will look like following your procedure with us. This helps us to collaborate with you, fixing any concerns or answering your queries before any work takes place. In addition to this, our team of professionals are highly skilled in what they do and have had years of training to ensure their practice is up-to-date and effective. Providing exceptional dental care is what we do best, but if you don’t just want to take our word for it, then please view our smile gallery online. Here you will find video and written reviews, as well as outstanding before and after pictures of our handy work. These patients put their faith in a Dubbo dental clinic and have never looked back. Are you ready to take the plunge and transform all your dental needs for the better? Emergency? Call Dubbo Dental Nobody wants to be left in the dark when they have a dental emergency. If you ever need a repair, suffer from tooth pain or experience a trauma, then our Smile On Clinic has got your back. We are pleased to inform you that we have an emergency helpline that runs 24/7, so you can count on us to support you, no matter your dental needs. Whether you are an existing or new patient, we aim to get you appropriate aid as quickly as possible, as we know all too well how stressful and difficult tooth issues can be. Put Your Faith in a Dubbo Family Dentist We are a proud Dubbo family dentist, which means that we welcome patients of all ages to our dental services. To maintain proper oral health as adults, it’s vital to educate the importance of this in childhood. Our team will make sure that your child enjoys their time with us, as well as learning vital skills such as proper tooth brushing, the effects of too much sugar, and why they should attend their regular check-ups. Doing this at an early age will not only help children become more comfortable when visiting the dentist, but they will also likely form much healthier habits when it comes to looking after their teeth. We aim to prevent tooth decay and other oral health concerns before they take place, and we feel that this education is the first step in achieving this. Comprehensive Dental Care Treatments We offer quality dental care for our Dubbo dental patients throughout an impressive range of services. Take a look below at just some of the treatments we provide: Dental implants Dentures Crowns and bridges Fillings Braces Clear aligners Jaw alignment treatment Teeth whitening Veneers Wisdom tooth removal Root canal therapy Palatal expanders Orthodontics Dubbo interventions For a full list of treatments, including descriptions and photographs, please view our webpage. Dental Care with Multiple Payment Options Our dental clinic in Dubbo gives you the choice of how to pay for your dental health. We have set up several different payment plans to suit individual circumstances and your required treatment. Additionally, if you do decide to pay in full, we do offer some services at a discounted rate. If you would like to discuss your options, please do speak to a member of the team, and we will be able to find a plan that suits you best. Alternatively, if you have insurance, we also accept all major health funds. Look Into Our Dubbo Dental Practice Today! So, next time you need a check-up, have a tooth emergency, or if you’re considering some cosmetic work, you’d be crazy not to consider our dental practice. But if you still require more information, why don’t you get in touch? Take advantage of our expert consultations so we can discuss your requirements. And whilst you’re waiting, feel free to view our entertaining blog. Here you will discover useful tips and find out so much more about our dentist in Dubbo. Your new and improved smile is just around the corner; you just need to make the first move, and Smile On Clinics will take care of the rest. title: Dentist in Griffith | Professional Dental Care You Can Trust
content: 2 Palla StreetGriffith NSW 2680 (02) 6964 1888 griffith@smileon.com.au www.smileongriffith.com.au facebook.com/smileonclinics instagram.com/smileonclinics If you are looking for a local dental practice which offers high quality dental treatment services and are the experts in dental implantology and cosmetic dentistry treatments, then Smile on Griffith is the ideal solution. Conveniently located at 2 Palla St, Griffith NSW 2680, Smile on Griffith (previously known as Riverina Smiles) is here to bring the best in dental care to Griffith and the surrounding region. Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 5pm Tuesday: 9am – 5pm Wednesday: 9am – 5pm Thursday: 9am – 5pm Friday: 9am – 4pm Saturday: CLOSED Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Looking for a Dentist in Griffith? If you’re looking for a dental practice in Griffith, you’ve come to the right place. Smile On Clinics is a local leader in both general dentistry and cosmetic treatments. From checkups to crowns, and cleanings to clear aligners, our experts have the skills and cutting-edge technology to make your next trip to a dentist in Griffith smooth and comfortable. Find a Qualified Orthodontist in Griffith Our dental clinics offer all common dental treatments designed to keep your smile white and healthy. Explore our range of treatment options below: General dental check-ups and cleanings Are you seeking a standard dental checkup? That’s no problem, and we’ll use the most advanced technology to assess your dental hygiene comprehensively and provide exceptional dental care. We also offer cleanings, which are designed to remove bacteria, plaque and tartar buildup from the surfaces of your teeth. It is recommended that you complete a teeth cleaning every six months for the best smile. Our general dentistry services also cover other services, such as crowns, veneers and implants. If you’re looking for a Griffith family dentist, Smile On Clinic’s range of generalist treatments ensures we can keep your family’s smiles in tip-top condition. Fillings for cavities Did you know that over 3/4 of the Australian population has had at least one filling? Our dentists can help install the filling type of your choice, aiming for a pain-free procedure. Teeth whitening If you’re looking to brighten your smile, we offer safe, effective teeth whitening. Using the most cutting-edge whitening methods, we restore unsightly stains to bright, clean tooth surfaces. Root canal therapy Root canal therapy is a highly effective dental treatment designed to save damaged or infected teeth, relieve pain and restore your natural smile. By gently removing the infection inside the tooth and sealing it, a root canal therapy procedure helps you avoid extractions, returning you to eating, speaking and smiling confidently. Tooth extractions Tooth extractions are a safe and routine procedure to remove damaged, decayed or problematic teeth, preserving your dental health in the long term. For example, a tooth extraction may be required if there’s a troublesome wisdom tooth removal. A tooth extraction will help relieve discomfort and pave the way for long-term solutions like dental implants or restorative treatments. Our tooth extractions are conducted using the best practices and technologies. Dental crowns and bridges Dental crowns are custom-made restorations designed to strengthen damaged or weakened teeth. As well as protecting damaged teeth, dental crowns will restore their natural look and function. Whether you need to repair a cracked tooth or complete a root canal treatment, crowns offer long-lasting protection and an effortlessly confident smile. Dental bridges fulfil a similar function. By filling gaps to restore your bite and enhance your appearance, dental bridges effectively substitute one or more missing teeth. Overall, bridges help you chew, speak and smile comfortably – without compromising your teeth’s natural appearance. Braces (metal, ceramic, lingual) Braces don’t have to be a source of embarrassment – find the braces that work for you with our range of options. When you chat to our dentists about orthodontic treatments they’ll help you find the right braces to serve you – and your smile. Smile On Straighter (clear aligners) Smile On Straighter Clear Aligners are a game-changing corrective treatment designed to move your teeth’s position comfortably. By gradually moving your teeth using a series of clear aligners, you can experience your straightest possible smile. The clear appearance reduces the aligners’ visibility for the most natural possible appearance. Retainers (post-treatment maintenance) After corrective orthodontics, consider maintaining your natural smile through custom-made retainers. These retainers will fit snugly around your teeth, preventing natural reversion towards their original position. Palatal expanders Palatal expanders are a staple of orthodontics. Designed to widen the upper arch, they’ll gently address overcrowding and crossbite. Jaw alignment treatments They’re just as they sound – jaw alignment treatments will use various implements (e.g. braces) to correct the jaw gently. Benefits of a corrected jaw include improved chewing, swallowing and breathing and improved function of the teeth. Early intervention orthodontics Whatever your requirements, Smile On Clinics has got you covered – and that includes dental needs like early intervention orthodontics (sometimes referred to as interceptive orthodontics). Early intervention orthodontics is an orthopaedic approach that ensures that the teeth and jaws develop correctly in children. Comprehensive oral exams Looking to understand your oral health in full? Smile On Clinics’ comprehensive dental care will ensure that you can make informed decisions about your dental health. Preventative dental care (cleanings, sealants) Effective preventative care will prevent the need for dental surgery – implants, extractions and so forth. Sealants will coat the surface of a vulnerable tooth, preventing further decay. Restorative services (fillings, crowns, bridges) Restorative services are essential in dentistry, and you should expect your local dental practice to provide all the basics – fillings, crowns and bridges. Cosmetic dentistry (veneers, whitening, bonding) Our Griffith dental clinic also offers a range of cosmetic dentistry treatments. For example, if you’re looking for high-quality veneers, we’re happy to assist. Orthodontic treatments (braces, aligners) Hundreds of thousands of Australians get braces, and once the braces have successfully realigned the teeth, we’ll fashion aligners to keep them in place. Emergency dental care (toothache, trauma repair) A dental emergency can be a source of intense anxiety. However, our expert approach will provide peace of mind when dealing with an out-of-hours emergency. It’s part of our commitment to serving local families – emergencies don’t always come at convenient times, and we’ve adjusted our availability to match. Discover More About Smile On’s Griffith Dental Clinic What makes Smile On Clinics a top choice for Griffith dental clinics? Firstly, our dental services are designed to put you first, aiming for a best-in-class customer experience. Our quality dental care extends to before, after and during treatment. We’ll meet all your dental needs, aiming to give you a five-star dental experience. We cater to all Griffith residents, making us a convenient choice. To consult with one of our trusted Griffith dentists, book a consultation today. title: Dentist Terrigal | Expert Dental Solutions for Your Family
content: 168 Terrigal Drive Terrigal NSW 2260 (02) 4385 1838 info@terrigalendodontics.com.au www.terrigalendodontics.com.au Facebook Instagram Terrigal Endodontics specialises in root canal treatments on the Central Coast. The clinic offers services including root canal treatment, re-treatment, and endodontic microsurgery using advanced technology. With over 30 years of experience, Tony ensures high success rates and affordable care. The clinic, part of Gunyah Dental, focuses on pain-free and stress-free procedures, offering same-day emergency treatment. Accredited and dedicated to patient safety, Terrigal Endodontics accepts referrals and direct appointments for all endodontic needs. We are always delighted to welcome new patients to the practice no matter how simple or complex your requirements may be. Opening Hours Monday: 8:30am – 5pm Tuesday: 8:30am – 5pm Wednesday: CLOSED Thursday: 8:30am – 5pm Friday: 8:30am – 5pm Saturday: CLOSED Sunday: CLOSED If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Welcome to Terrigal Dental Practice, Where Your Smile is Our Priority Welcome to the Smile On Clinics dental family. As your Terrigal family dentist, we are committed to providing you with the highest quality dental care in a warm, friendly, and comfortable environment. Whether you are here for a routine check-up, cosmetic enhancement, or a restorative procedure, our team of skilled experts is dedicated to ensuring you achieve a healthy, confident smile. With experienced dentists and caring staff together with the latest advancements in dental technology, we can offer personalised treatments tailored to your unique needs. We understand that a visit to the dentist can sometimes feel overwhelming, which is why we prioritise patient comfort, clear communication, and compassionate care. Whatever your treatment, we’re here to support your oral health every step of the way. A healthy smile contributes to overall well-being, and we’re privileged to be a part of your dental journey. Leading Cosmetic Dentist in Terrigal Our Smile On Clinics dental practitioners are renowned for transforming smiles with precision, artistry, and advanced dental techniques. With years of experience and a passion for excellence, we specialise in smile makeovers, implants, teeth straightening, teeth whitening, porcelain veneers, and dental bonding, helping our patients achieve the confident, radiant smiles they deserve. Combining cutting-edge technology with a keen eye for aesthetics, we tailor each treatment to enhance natural beauty while ensuring optimal dental health. We build trust with Terrigal residents when we provide a personalised approach, compassionate care, and outstanding results. From correcting discoloration to reshaping teeth, we aim to deliver stunning, long-lasting transformations. Smile On Clinics stays at the forefront of cosmetic dentistry through continuous education and innovation. With a commitment to excellence, we are dedicated to helping patients smile brighter with confidence and pride. An Elite Experience for Every Patient At our Terrigal dental clinic every patient is treated like a VIP. From the moment you step into our practice, you’ll enjoy a personalised, calm dental experience designed for comfort and care. Our attentive team will cater to your needs offering soothing amenities, flexible scheduling, and a stress-free environment. Enjoy a relaxing atmosphere, advanced technology, and tailored treatments that prioritise your health and aesthetics. We will ensure you experience a seamless, first-class experience. Your comfort, confidence, and satisfaction are our top priorities because you deserve the best. Enjoy a Brand-New Smile Maintaining a healthy smile requires regular dental care and, at times, specialised treatments. From routine cleanings to advanced restorative and cosmetic procedures, our comprehensive dental care offers solutions for every need. Understanding these common dental procedures can help you make informed decisions about your oral health and achieve a confident, radiant smile: Dental Cleanings & Exams: Our routine check-ups include professional cleaning, plaque removal, and an examination to detect any oral health issues early. Teeth Whitening: This cosmetic procedure is performed to remove stains and discolouration, brightening teeth for a whiter, more radiant smile. Dental Fillings: Used to restore teeth damaged by cavities or decay, fillings can be made of composite resin, gold, or porcelain. Dental Crowns: Custom-made caps are placed over damaged or weakened teeth to restore strength, function, and appearance. Porcelain Veneers: Thin, custom-made shells are bonded to the front of teeth to improve shape, size, and colour for a flawless smile. Dental Implants: Permanent or removable replacements for missing teeth, consisting of a titanium post surgically placed in the jawbone with a custom crown. Dental Bridges: These fixed restorations are used to replace missing teeth using artificial teeth anchored by crowns on adjacent teeth. Root Canal Therapy: A procedure to remove infected pulp from inside a tooth, relieving pain and preventing extraction. Tooth Extractions: To remove damaged, decayed, or impacted teeth, including wisdom teeth removal if necessary. Orthodontics (Braces & Clear Aligners): Treatments like traditional braces or clear aligners are administered to straighten teeth and correct bite issues. Gum Disease Treatment (Periodontics): Includes scaling and root planing or laser therapy to treat gum infections and prevent tooth loss. Full & Partial Dentures: Removable prosthetic teeth are used to replace multiple missing teeth for restored function and aesthetics. Smile Makeover: This comprehensive treatment plan combines multiple cosmetic and restorative procedures to enhance the overall smile appearance. TMJ Treatment: Solutions for jaw pain and temporomandibular joint disorders, including bite adjustments and night guards. Sedation Dentistry: Various sedation options, such as nitrous oxide or IV sedation, to help patients feel relaxed and comfortable during treatment. A Reliable Team with Reliable Dental Services With Smile On Clinics, you can count on a team that’s more than just skilled professionals; we’re your partners in achieving a healthy, beautiful smile. Dedicated, compassionate, and always ready to help, we take pride in providing you with quality dental care for a comfortable, stress-free experience. From the moment we meet you, you’ll be greeted with warm smiles and genuine care. Our trusted Terrigal dentists, hygienists, and support staff work together to provide top-quality treatments with a personal touch. Whether your visit is for a routine check-up or a smile transformation, we’re committed to ensuring you feel valued, informed, and at ease. Trust us to make your dental care positive, efficient, and even enjoyable. Looking For a New Orthodontist in Terrigal? Your choice of dental services provider is an extremely important decision. It may seem insignificant, but your oral health and overall well-being depend on it. You deserve a Terrigal dental practice that offers top-quality care, a friendly atmosphere, and a team that truly listens to your needs. Whatever your concerns may be, finding a dentist who makes you feel comfortable and valued is key. At Smile On Clinics, we are dedicated to providing exceptional care with a personal touch. If you’re looking for a reliable, compassionate dentist in Terrigal, we’d love to welcome you and look forward to building a long-lasting relationship with you and your family. Have questions that need to be answered or would like to make an appointment? Don’t hesitate to get in touch today. We can’t wait to see you smile. title: Dentist in Manly | Comprehensive Dental Solutions
content: 3 Darley RdManly NSW 2095 (02) 7204 0600 info@whitespacedental.com.au whitespacedental.com.au facebook.com/whitespacedental instagram.com/whitespacedental White Space Dental & Implant Centre located in Manly is a truly stunning interpretation of what a modern dental practice can be. The dental practice evokes a day spa ambience, Dr Laura Smit and her team are sure to put you at ease. Dr Laura has a special interest in digital smile design and is your go to person to discuss smile makeovers or any concerns you have about your teeth and their appearance. Building a reputation based on trust and warmth, White Space Dental Manly offers a fresh and unique dental experience to make you feel comfortable at all times. Your local Manly dental practice Located at 3 Darley Rd, in the stunning Heritage building, next to the church. Parking available — There are 3 council car parks within 2 mins walking distance, all with 2 hrs. free parking (Coles Car Park: entrance on Wentworth St, Whistler St Car park, Manly National car park). Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 5pm Tuesday: 9am – 5pm Wednesday: 9am – 5pm Thursday: 9am – 5pm Friday: 9am – 4pm Saturday (alternate): 8am – 1pm Sunday: CLOSED Do You Need to Visit a Dentist in Manly? This lets us serve the Manly area and more. Rather than a cold corporation, each of our clinics is operated by the dentists themselves. This gives each dental clinic a personal feel, and we have a light touch, providing training on new technologies and techniques and checking our core business values are being upheld. These values are teamwork, compassion, communication, and integrity. Teamwork is shown through our joint training and by the teams checking in with each other on the best treatment plans for patients. Compassion is shown through the approach to your dental care, making you feel comfortable and supported throughout. Communication is demonstrated through the fact that we’re always upfront with our patients. We talk you through the steps we want to take and why and how the proposed treatment plan lines up with your budget and goals. Finally, integrity underpins everything we do at our Manly dental practice. All our clinics are designed with patient comfort in mind, and we don’t take your trust in us for granted. We believe these values and our friendly approach make patients for life. Many of those who use our services have left reviews for our Manly dental clinic to prove that our values are working, and we hope this convinces more people to become Smile On patients for life. We Provide Exceptional Dental Care Across Multiple Specialties As we mentioned above, we put continual training as a high priority for all clinics in our network. This means our clinics are staffed by curious, knowledgeable team members who can cover almost all dental specialties between them. Make your life easier by choosing one dental practice that can do it all rather than having to make time for visiting one for check-ups, one for cosmetics, etc. We take child and adult patients, so your whole family can be seen. Routine check-ups are recommended twice a year at your Manly family dentist as this keeps on top of your mouth health and allows your dentist to look for any issues before they develop further. At our dental clinic in Manly, we’ll use a thorough technique to check your mouth and teeth, including x-rays, to see if there are any structural issues. An example of this would be wisdom teeth coming in at an angle, indicating the patient will need wisdom tooth removal to prevent issues such as making the surrounding teeth harder to clean. We also suggest professional cleanings as part of your general dentistry appointments. This helps remove plaque and tartar build-up that can be missed with brushing at home. It also helps promote good gum health and, for children, helps them become used to dental treatments, hopefully preventing nerves around the dentist developing later in life. With Smile On, our clinics are a great choice if you’re looking for a dentist who provides orthodontic treatments in Manly. During routine check-ups, if we notice signs of jaw misalignment in a child, we can quickly begin early intervention orthodontic care with the same trusted team. These treatments often reduce the time required for future orthodontic work and take advantage of the natural jaw growth phase to achieve major corrections more easily. For instance, palatal expanders—custom-designed for each patient—gently widen the upper jaw by applying pressure on either side. This technique helps correct mismatches in upper and lower jaw development, ensuring a balanced bite and creating enough space for adult teeth to emerge properly. We also offer straightening orthodontic treatments for both children and adults, with a variety of brace types available. Options depend on how quickly realignment is needed and whether patients prefer visible or more discreet solutions. Our dentist in Manly also offers cosmetic services, so we can help you restore or upgrade your smile, and we have a treatment for almost everyone. We’re experts in Teeth On Implants which can replace multiple missing teeth without needing one implant per tooth which means this option is available for people who’ve experienced some bone loss already whereas other dental implants need more bone density as there is one implant screwed into the jaw per artificial tooth. For those who don’t need restoration services, we can still offer smile upgrades. If you’re just looking for a tweak that helps reverse the staining from your morning coffees, we offer professional tooth whitening. This treatment typically helps your teeth shine for a few months. We can also provide more permanent upgrades, such as veneers that cover crooked or damaged teeth to provide a full, straight smile that most people crave. This shows that for Manly, dental is totally covered with our Smile On clinic. Our team will work with you to find the best treatments for your budget and lifestyle. We approach each patient as an individual and take the time to help you craft your ideal smile. Book Into Our Trusted Manly Dentist for Emergencies and Routine Dental Work Now we’ve looked at our pre-planned dental treatments, let’s consider what happens if your teeth give you a challenge you can’t plan for. Each Smile On clinic has some room in their schedule to accommodate emergencies for Manly residents, so you can benefit from our calming clinic environment at a stressful time. We will work to make you comfortable as quickly as possible, whether you’re dealing with a tooth infection or an injury. We’ll stop the bleeding or check for an abscess in cases of infection and leave you with antibiotics and/or treatment to help with swelling. You will likely then need to come back for further work, such as cavity treatment, once the antibiotics have kicked in. A dental emergency can be a stressful time, but we’ll do our best to help you recover quickly. Whether routine or urgent, you can trust Smile On clinics with your dental health. To get started, head to our ‘locations’ tab to find the closest clinic to you. Details of the team members, opening times, and how to contact them are on each clinic page. They’re eager to welcome you for your first appointment. title: Dentist Mona Vale | Comprehensive Family Dental Care
content: Suite 1, 1731 Pittwater RdMona Vale, NSW 2103 (02) 9997 1122 monavale@smileon.com.au www.smileonmonavale.com.au Facebook Instagram We are always delighted to welcome new patients to the practice no matter how simple or complex your requirements may be. Proudly powered by Smile On Clinics, Smile On Mona Vale is your go-to dentist, offering high quality dental treatment in a caring and welcoming environment. Everything we do revolves around your patient journey and ensuring that each and every one of our patients can enjoy a tailor-made smile. Opening Hours Monday: 9:00am – 5pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 5pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 5pm Thursday: 9:00am – 5pm Friday: 9:00am – 5pm Saturday: CLOSED Sunday: CLOSED Just the Kind of Dentist Mona Vale Needs There is more than one reason for visiting a dentist, and these days it doesn’t have to mean trouble. It can be to do with looking good as much as feeling good, which begs the question of what kind of dentist Mona Vale needs. Or rather, what kind of dental clinic Mona Vale needs, because a clinic is about more than one person with a drill and some shiny instruments. In the early days of dentistry, it was all about extractions. Then came the age of the filling, when practical considerations were more important than how the tooth looked. These days, we all expect more. We want a fully functioning set of teeth that also looks great. If you haven’t embraced the possibilities yet – or perhaps it’s someone you know who is lagging behind – allow us to run through just some of the options that are now available at the kind of dentist Mona Vale has access to thanks to Smile On Clinics. The Purely Practical Let’s not forget that the primary reason for the existence of dentists is still for fixing things. Teeth are hard at work every day, making it possible for us to eat all the wonderful things that are on the menu these days. Everything needs to be processed by our teeth, and that includes healthy, unadulterated raw foods. If your teeth are crunching down on raw carrots or Brazil nuts, that is pressure, and it imposes stress on the teeth and gums. It’s a different kind of stress from the meat-eater tearing away at a steak, but it is wear and tear just the same, and problems are inevitably going to occur at some point. As for decay, modern toothpastes may be better at preventing cavities than those of years ago, and education means that at least people are aware that, for instance, sugary sweets are not as innocent as they seem. Fillings for cavities now benefit from the development of materials that are extremely resilient and also look very tooth-like, so they blend in rather than glaring at the world. So, teeth get cracked and holes appear, and these issues have to be dealt with by a dentist. Injuries happen, too, and when they do, the dentist is there to make things better. Tooth extractions may be the last resort, but when it’s got to go, it’s got to go. Unfortunately, many people still don’t take good care of their teeth, and even if you do, it is wise to have a check-up regularly, because a good dentist can spot trouble before it becomes a problem and take steps to resolve the situation. The Value of a Confident Smile Smiling is good. It is a natural indication of happiness. But that doesn’t mean that non-smiley people are less happy. It can just be that they are reluctant to let it happen because it will expose their teeth, and they are self-conscious about them. That could be for reasons of alignment, such as protruding front teeth or a general irregularity. Everyone is born with teeth, and once the original ones, the “milk teeth”, have gone, we are provided with 32 new ones that are to serve us all our adult life. Ideally, these are neatly arranged, but that isn’t always the case, and braces or aligners are needed to straighten things out. The alignment process is often carried out when we’re young, which is technically called early intervention orthodontics, but new developments, including the brilliant Invisalign treatment, have led to more and more people opting for this in their 20s and beyond. Smile On Straighter Clear Aligners are far less obvious than old-style braces. They are made of clear material and are very comfortable, with the added advantage that you can take it out for eating, brushing your teeth or other activities, as long as you put it back promptly and it is in position for 20-22 hours a day. Cosmetic Treatments If your teeth are unattractive because of their colour or irregular shape, there are ways of dealing with them. Teeth whitening procedures can be very effective when carried out by a professional. Another option is veneers, which are thin shells, usually made of porcelain or composite resin, that are tailor-made to fit over a particular tooth and are absolutely convincing. They are so comfortable that the wearer quickly forgets about them, and the rest of the world is none the wiser; they just see a nice set of teeth. Rebuild or Replace Dental crowns have long been used to rebuild teeth, using the existing root as the base onto which a solid replacement is added. An even better solution in many cases is what is known as dental implants. The implants themselves take the place of the root; they are made of titanium and are screwed into the jawbone, where a natural process called osseointegration binds them even more firmly. Replacement teeth are then fitted to the implants and the result is as good as the original tooth and root: firm, resilient and coloured to match the surrounding teeth, so you can eat with confidence and beam that big smile or laugh out loud, safe in the knowledge that your teeth look great. Find a Clinic That Can Do It All The answer to the question of what kind of dental clinic Mona Vale needs is an all-round dental clinic that can provide all the services we have just looked at. And now you’ve found it. Smile On Clinics is a group of all-round dental clinics, and the Mona Vale practice is at 1731 Pittwater Road. If you have something in mind, or if you would just like to explore the possibilities before deciding what to go for, fill in the online enquiry form and we’ll be in touch to discuss what you need and schedule an appointment. Whether you have a pressing need for treatment or a long-term aim of making your teeth the best they can be, the dentist Mona Vale trusts is right here, waiting to help you.
