title: Dentist in Nelson Bay | Comprehensive Family Dentistry
content: Shop 3/63 Donald St,Nelson Bay NSW 2315 Book Now! (02) 4981 1576 info@nelsonbaydental.com.au www.nelsonbaydental.com.au facebook.com/nelsonbaydental instagram.com/nelsonbay.dental Healthy smiles for the whole family At Nelson Bay Dental, we are committed to helping you optimise the health of your teeth and gums. At our practice – owned and run by Dr Andrew Huntington, our aim is to help you keep your teeth for life – Our areas of expertise extend to cosmetic and advanced restorative including dental implants. Our team is very experienced, friendly and reassuring and will put you at ease. Your comfort is our absolute priority. We will consult with you every step of the way – covering the options that will best suit your needs and budget. Sedation is available for all the treatments we offer at our practice. To find out more about the treatments we offer, or book an appointment, call us today on (02) 4981 1576. Opening Hours Monday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Tuesday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Wednesday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Thursday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Friday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Saturday: CLOSED Sunday: CLOSED Late appointments available on request. Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Anxious About a Visit to Your Nelson Bay Dentist? If you are a Nelson Bay resident needing dental treatments, but you feel anxious or nervous about going to the dentist, then worry not, you are not the only one. Many people avoid going to the dentist because of an unfounded fear or a bad experience in the past, but this doesn’t help oral health as untreated issues can lead to gum disease, cavities and even tooth loss. The exceptional dental care our dentists in Nelson Bay can provide will restore your smile and boost your confidence, and not only improve your dental health but your general health too, as poor oral hygiene can increase the risk of certain conditions like heart disease, diabetes and respiratory infections. At Smile On clinics, we aim to make your visit as comfortable and stress-free as possible, so for those who feel too anxious to visit a dental clinic, we offer sleep dentistry. This form of dental treatment involves intravenous sedation and anaesthesia, so the patient is asleep during the procedure, which reduces pain, awareness and recollection. It can be a serious deterrent if you feel nervous about visiting the dentist, so our Nelson Bay family dentist can perform sedation in the dental chair for any member of the family and any procedure, from a simple clean and polish to a wisdom tooth removal. However, for more complex cases or for those patients who would rather be completely sedated for their procedure, general anaesthetic facilities are performed at a private hospital where we can deliver our quality dental care, and you won’t know a thing about it! Nelson Bay Dental Practice Services At Smile On Clinics, our highly trained team offers a wide range of dental services to help restore your smile and improve your dental health. We believe in preventative care and recommend regular check-ups with your Nelson Bay dentist for general cleaning and polishing, and to check that there are no underlying issues with your teeth, gums and overall health. Poor oral hygiene can significantly impact your general health, as bacteria from gum disease can enter the bloodstream and increase the risk of heart problems or stroke or be inhaled into the lungs and lead to respiratory illness. Your friendly dentist in Nelson Bay is the first line of defence against dental disease and helping you to improve your general well-being. You and your family can enjoy comprehensive dental care at our Nelson Bay dental clinic, where you can expect to receive the very best of care combined with the latest technology for dental implants, cosmetic dentistry, dental crowns and bridges, orthodontic treatments and dental emergencies such as tooth ache and trauma repair. At your trusted Nelson Bay dentist, you will find expert care for your children’s teeth and general practice orthodontics, because we understand how important it is to build up a good relationship with your dentist when you are young, and for your children to understand and learn the importance of good oral hygiene. We make these visits fun and light-hearted, and encourage little ones to develop positive lifelong habits like brushing twice a day and being aware of the damage sugary foods and drinks can cause to their teeth. By practicing positive reinforcement, such as rewarding their bravery at the end of their visit, children will look forward to the next visit to the dental practice rather than dreading it. What Is Cosmetic Dentistry? While the focus on cosmetic dentistry is to improve the appearance of your smile by enhancing the aesthetics of your teeth and gums, and enhancing symmetry and balance, it also goes a long way to improve both mental and physical health. Individuals who are embarrassed by wonky or stained teeth often lack confidence and may even have speech or chewing issues. To improve the colour, position, shape, size and alignment of teeth, you may need to undergo any of the following treatments: teeth whitening Clear aligners dental veneers dental implants Teeth that are chipped, cracked or discoloured can be improved by placing a very thin, custom-made shell over the front of them to improve their appearance, and once these dental veneers are in place, they look completely natural and improve any smile. Smile On Straighter Clear Aligners uses custom-made aligners that are clear and removable, and work to straighten the teeth in a painless yet effective manner. Having bright, evenly coloured teeth goes a long way to boosting a person’s confidence, and our in-chair treatments remove stains and reduce discolouration without damaging tooth enamel. Once you have a beautiful smile, you are more likely to take care of your teeth to maintain your new appearance. Wonky teeth that cross each other create crevices that are hard to clean, where bacteria can build up and cause tooth decay and other dental issues. This type of dental care not only makes you look and feel better, but it is also better for your dental health too. Smile On Clinics for All Your Dental Needs Finding a clinic that can provide you with exceptional dental care is vital to the oral and general health of you and your family. Our teeth are one of our most important features, and with regular visits to your dentist in Nelson Bay and by developing good oral hygiene habits, you can have a happy and healthy smile throughout your life. Having treatments as and when you need them ensures that little problems don’t develop into big issues, so at the first signs of dental issues like toothache, sensitivity, bleeding or swollen gums or persistent bad breath, you should book an appointment. Whether you require a simple filling, root canal therapy or a comprehensive oral exam, the sooner you start treatment, the easier it will be. Don’t let financial issues get in the way – we offer all sorts of services to suit all sorts of budgets and accept health funds and offer monthly payment plans to ease the financial strain. Whatever your dental needs are, we’re here to help put that smile back on your face! title: Dentist Thornton | Comprehensive Dental Care Solutions
content: Thornton Healthcare ComplexSuites 3, 4 & 9/2 Poynton PlaceThornton NSW 2322 (02) 4044 1840 reception@poyntonplacedental.com.au www.poyntonplacedental.com.au facebook.com/poyntonplacedental/ instagram.com/poyntonplacedental/ Conveniently located at 2 Poynton Place, Thornton within the Thornton Healthcare Complex and next to Providence Medical, Poynton Place Dental & Implant Centre is here to bring the best in dental care to Thornton and the surrounding Maitland region. With services ranging from general dentistry which includes: check-ups, maintenance, preventive & restorative (fillings) treatments, extractions, root canal treatments and crowns; to more specialised treatments such as dental implants, Teeth On Implants®, orthodontics, oral rehabilitation, cosmetic dentistry & surgical removal of wisdom teeth, and dental sedation, by offering an array of the latest digital technologies, Poynton Place Dental & Implant Centre can accommodate any dental procedure. In most cases, patients can have their treatment completed in full at the practice. Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 5pm Tuesday: 9am – 5pm Wednesday: 9am – 5pm Thursday: 9am – 5pm Friday: 9am – 5pm Saturday: 9am – 5pm Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Thornton Dental Practice at Your Service! What’s the most important thing to you when visiting the dentist? Professionalism? Safety? Skilled practitioners? Is it the reassurance of feeling comfortable the second you walk through the door? Well, here at Smile On Dental, you don’t just have to choose one, because we offer all of this and so much more. We are a trusted Thornton dentist providing comprehensive dental care to Thornton residents. Whether you’re young, old, or anything in between, we can cater for all your dental needs, no matter your current oral health status. Book an appointment with our wonderful team to see what magic we can work on you. Then stick with us at Smile On Dental. Comprehensive Dental Care for all We really do mean it when we say that we offer a wide selection of dental services. If you choose to visit our Thornton dental clinic, here are just some of the treatments you can expect: General dentistry General dentistry covers pretty much everything you think of when visiting the dentist. It includes your routine check-ups, preventative work, cleaning, fillings and wisdom tooth removal. Remember, booking regular appointments at your dental clinic will give your teeth the very best chance to remain healthy and attractive, so if you haven’t visited a dentist for a while, give us a call now! Cosmetic dentistry Individuals visit us for cosmetic work when their teeth are healthy but perhaps fancy a little makeover. We can use teeth whitening treatments, bonding or veneers to improve the overall look of your teeth. Restorative dentistry Have broken, chipped or missing teeth? Then our dentist in Thornton can help. Depending on your situation, you may choose dental implants, crowns or bridges. If you’re not sure what’s best, then just give us a call! Orthodontics You may see our orthodontics team for teeth straightening services. We have a selection of variants to choose from depending on your requirements and budget. This includes fixed braces and clear aligners. Jaw alignment treatments will also be treated under this category. Emergency dental care You’ve heard us correctly. We provide care during your dental emergency, whether you’re an existing patient or not! Simply call our hotline, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and one of our team will do their utmost to get you exceptional dental care in the quickest time possible. For more information regarding the full list of services provided at our Thornton dental practice, please view our website. Expect One-of-a-Kind Treatment at Our Thornton Dental Clinic As an independently owned company, we are 100% dedicated to providing exceptional dental care for our patients. We ensure that our professionals are highly trained and use the most effective technology available, as we aim for the best outcomes possible for our patients. Our digital smile design feature lets you become part of the process, as this enables you to see your new smile on the screen before any work takes place. This allows us to work out any issues and set your expectations on what your new and improved smile will look like! At Smile On Clinics, no patient is treated in the same way, because unlike some other dental health providers, we actually take the time to understand your individual requirements. If you would like to take advantage of our consultations, then please do get in touch with us at our Thornton dental clinic, where you will meet with one of our professionals to discuss your needs, goals and budget. Following this, a tailor-made treatment plan will be created to suit you. This means that you will receive the most appropriate care for your needs. Who could ask for more?! You’ll be Safe in the Hands of a Thornton Family Dentist Providing quality dental care for our youngest patients is extremely important to us, as it prevents concerns such as tooth decay and teaches children proper oral health practices that they can take into adulthood. Another benefit of bringing your child to a Thornton family dentist early on is that they can become comfortable with our practice and know what to expect during an appointment. Our friendly staff members will welcome your children with open arms, making them feel at ease with our inviting toys in our waiting room. We will explain in simple terms exactly what will happen during their time with us, and will also provide useful information around tooth brushing, the effects of too much sugar, and why visiting the dentist is important for their overall health and well-being. We also recommend that your child bring something from home, such as a toy or game, to help them feel even more secure at our dental practice. Once we have finished, we will give them a small reward to celebrate a job well done. Children deserve the best start in life when it comes to their oral health, and we believe that we at Smile On Clinics are most equipped to provide this. Multiple Payment Options – Including Health Funds We are happy to announce that we accept all mainstream health funds; however, if you are covering the cost of your dental treatments yourself, then we have several choices for you. We have some discounts available if you pay for your services in full, however, we do also provide a choice of handy payment plans to suit your circumstances. If you would like to discuss your options, please call our dental practice. Your Soon to be Favourite Thornton Dental Clinic So, there you have it. If we haven’t convinced you to visit a Smile On Clinics dentist, Thornton, or otherwise for your dental needs, then we don’t know what will! We do advise, however, for you to read our outstanding success stories on our webpage. View stories and before and after pictures from real life patients and see just how we have transformed their smile, confidence and lifestyle. Are you ready to be next? title: Orthodontist Saratoga | Straighten Your Smile with Confidence
content: 12/10 Village RdSaratoga NSW 2251 (02) 4363 1449 reception@saratogadental.com.au www.saratogadental.com.au facebook.com/saratogadentists instagram.com/saratogadental Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 6pm Tuesday: 9am – 6pm Wednesday: 9am – 6pm Thursday: 9am – 6pm Friday: 9am – 6pm Saturday: 9am – 1pm Sunday: CLOSED Late appointments available on request. Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Experience Exceptional Dental Care at Your Saratoga Dental Clinic Are you looking for a trusted Saratoga dentist who can provide comprehensive dental care for your entire family? Our Saratoga dental practice combines all the benefits of the latest in dental technology, while offering our patients care and compassion at every appointment. To help ensure you get the highest quality dental care, we’ve developed our practice to cover all of the most common dental work, and even some of the less common treatments, too. On top of that, we have our own Smile On Lab which ensures your implants are completed quickly and accurately. Whether you’re looking for a routine appointment for a mid-year check-up or you need some help to put the confidence back in your smile, Smile On Clinics is ready to deliver, with all your dental needs taken care of in one place. Personalised Dental Treatments at Our Saratoga Dental Clinic What sets our practice apart is our personalised approach to dental health. We prioritise delivering specifically tailored care to every patient who visits our Saratoga dental clinic. We take the time to listen to you as you tell us your dental concerns. Our team aims to understand your dental history, current issues, and dental goals before recommending any treatment options. For Saratoga residents seeking exceptional dental care, our facility offers the perfect combination of technical expertise and genuine care for our patients. Whether you’re new to the area or looking to switch to a Saratoga family dentist who truly listens, our doors are open to welcome you. Maintain Your Smile with Regular Preventative Treatments For some, the thought of visiting the dentist can cause them to break out in a sweat. We get it – and we’re here to help you every step of the way. If this is you, please speak with our team to let us know how we can help you access the dental services you require. Preventative treatments are centred around keeping your teeth healthy and bright – these include having a professional cleaning, tartar build-up removal, and polishing. For some, this is enough to keep those pearly whites in peak condition. At each check-up, we’ll take a look for the common problems – cavities, cracks, etc. – as well as give you a more comprehensive check-up for more serious (occasionally less obvious) problems or concerns that we should keep an eye on. Prevention tactics (regular check-ups, brushing and flossing twice a day at least) are essential for long-term excellent dental health. Regular visits to your dentist in Saratoga can help identify potential issues before they develop into serious problems requiring extensive (and sometimes expensive) dental treatments. Our preventative services include: Thorough dental examinations using advanced diagnostic technology Professional teeth cleaning to remove plaque and tartar buildup Digital X-rays for comprehensive assessment Oral cancer screenings Personalised oral hygiene education By focusing on preventative care, we help Saratoga residents maintain healthy teeth and gums, potentially saving them from discomfort and more costly treatments in the future. Comprehensive Restorative Solutions for Complex Dental Needs Even with excellent home care, dental issues can sometimes arise. When they do, our Saratoga dental practice offers a complete range of restorative dental treatments to repair damage and restore function: Tooth-coloured fillings for cavities Crown and bridge work for damaged or missing teeth Root canal therapy for infected teeth Dentures and partial dentures Wisdom tooth removal Dental implants As your trusted Saratoga dentist, we use only the highest quality materials and the latest techniques to ensure long-lasting results. Whether you need a simple filling or complete mouth rehabilitation, our goal is to restore both function and aesthetics while preserving as much of your natural tooth structure as possible. Advanced Dental Implant Technology Available in Saratoga Having missing teeth doesn’t necessarily mean poor dental hygiene practices – teeth can be knocked out during contact sports, or by tripping over your shoelaces. Small, insignificant cracks in teeth can slowly become larger over time, which can result in a split tooth. This might loosen and eventually fall out. No matter how our patients have lost their teeth in the first place, one thing unites them all… each one of them has felt some impact on the way they socialise, and the confidence they feel (or lack thereof) when they smile. Missing teeth can affect both your oral health and self-confidence. Our Saratoga dental clinic specialises in dental implants – the gold standard for tooth replacement. These solutions offer several advantages over traditional bridges or dentures: Look and function like natural teeth Preserve jawbone structure Prevent shifting of adjacent teeth No adhesives or special cleaning routines required Can last a lifetime with proper care For Saratoga residents considering implants, we will provide comprehensive consultations to determine if this option is right for you. Our experienced team will guide you through every point of the journey, from initial consultation to the final placement. Using the latest in dental technology, you’ll have a say in how your smile appears at the end of your implant journey. Unlike elsewhere, where the dentist has final say, you’ll be able to ‘trial’ a version of your new smile with our software, so you can choose the results you desire before work even begins. Cosmetic Dentistry: Transform Your Smile Your smile is often the first thing people notice about you. If you’re unhappy with the appearance of your teeth, our cosmetic dental services can help transform your smile and boost your confidence: Professional teeth whitening Porcelain veneers Dental bonding Clear aligner orthodontics Smile makeovers Your Saratoga family dentist understands that aesthetic concerns are just as important as functional ones. We take pride in creating beautiful, natural-looking results that complement your facial features and personality. Children’s Dentistry: Building Healthy Habits Early As a family-oriented practice, we place special emphasis on the dental care of Saratoga’s youngsters. Your Saratoga family dentist creates positive, gentle experiences for young patients to build a foundation for lifelong oral health. Our children’s services include: Kid-friendly first dental visits Preventative treatments like sealants and fluoride Education about proper brushing and flossing techniques Early orthodontic assessment We understand that early experiences at the dentist can shape attitudes toward dental care for years to come. That’s why we strive to make each visit fun, educational, and stress-free for our youngest patients. Emergency Dental Care When You Need It Most Have you ever noticed that a dental emergency rarely happens at convenient times? When you’re facing severe pain, a broken tooth, or other urgent dental issues, prompt treatment is essential. Our Saratoga dental practice offers emergency appointments for: Severe toothaches Knocked-out or fractured teeth Lost fillings or crowns Dental infections and abscesses Injuries to the mouth or jaw If you’re in Saratoga and experiencing a dental emergency, swift action – calling your Smile On Clinics dentist asap – can make a significant difference to the type of dental care you need, and the amount of time you’ll spend dealing with the problem. Don’t hesitate to contact us immediately if you’re experiencing dental pain or trauma. We’re here to help with your urgent dental needs. Health Fund Options Available We believe that quality dental care should be accessible to everyone. Our Saratoga dental clinic works with most major health funds to maximize your benefits and minimize out-of-pocket expenses. For treatments not fully covered by insurance, we offer flexible payment options to help fit comprehensive dental care into your budget. Health funds we accept include: Ahm Apia Australian Unity Bupa CBHS Health HCF Medibank Your Partner in Oral Health Choosing the right dentist is an important decision that affects your long-term dental health. As your trusted Saratoga dentist, we’re committed to building lasting relationships with our patients based on trust, respect, and exceptional care. From routine check-ups to complex dental treatments, our team is dedicated to providing exceptional dental care in a comfortable, welcoming environment. We take pride in helping our patients in Saratoga to achieve and maintain healthy, beautiful smiles that last a lifetime. Contact our Saratoga dental clinic today to schedule your initial consultation and discover the difference that truly personalised dental care can make for your smile and overall well-being. content: Level 2, Cnr The Esplanade & Second Avenue,COTTON TREE, QLD 4558 (07) 5443 2800 reception@scsmilecentre.com scsmilecentre.com.au facebook.com/scsmilecentre instagram.com/scsmilecentre Your Dentist in Maroochydore offers all dental services including emergency, sports, mouthguards, crowns, bridges, teeth whitening, child, adult with longer appointment times. We believe in good old fashioned customer service and quality care. We offer longer appointment times and are passionate about restoring and maintaining the health of our patient’s teeth and gums. Welcome to Smile On Clinics – An Affordable, Quality Dentist in Maroochydore Finding a skilled, affordable dentist who prioritises quality care can be challenging, but Smile On Clinics, Sunshine Coast Smile Centre, makes it easy. We offer exceptional dental services at budget-friendly prices, ensuring that everyone has access to premium oral care. Our experienced team uses state-of-the-art technology to provide gentle, effective treatments, from routine cleanings to advanced procedures. The comfort and satisfaction of each and every one of our patients are our top priorities, with a welcoming atmosphere and personalised care for every visit. Whether you need preventive care or urgent treatment, we aim to deliver expert solutions without breaking the bank. Contact us today to experience exceptional dentistry that fits your budget. Beautifully Designed Smiles at Sunshine Coast Smile Centre Achieve the dazzling smile you’ve always wanted with our Sunshine Coast Smile Centre team. We specialise in cosmetic and restorative dentistry, creating stunning, natural-looking smiles tailored to your unique features. With our advanced technology and personalised treatment plans, we can offer teeth whitening, veneers, Clear aligners like Invisalign, and much more to enhance your confidence. Whether you want subtle improvements or a complete smile makeover, our gentle and precise approach ensures exceptional results. At our welcoming Maroochydore dental clinic, your oral health comes first. Let Smile On Clinics transform your smile with care and expertise. We Provide a VIP Experience At Smile On Clinics, you’ll receive top-tier dental care with a VIP touch. From the moment you walk through the doors of our dental clinic in Maroochydore, you’ll be treated with respect and provided with exceptional comfort and premium services tailored to your needs. Enjoy a dental surgery that is designed for relaxation, with cutting-edge technology for precise dental treatments, together with a dedicated team ensuring an effortless, five-star experience. We provide first-class dentistry with the highest level of care and discretion, because you deserve nothing less. We Have the Solutions to Your Dental Needs Our dental experts are the best at what they do and can offer comprehensive dental solutions to keep your smile healthy and beautiful. From cleaning to dental implants, our expert team ensures top-quality, personalised care. Using modern techniques, we create confident, lasting smiles with lasting results: Preventative dental care Cleanings: Our dental cleaning services keep your smile healthy by removing plaque, tartar, and stains. We gently clean your teeth and gums, preventing cavities, gum disease, and bad breath, ensuring a fresh, bright smile. Sealants: Avoid cavities with our fissue sealants. This protective shield is painlessly fitted and is ideal for children and adults, helping to maintain strong, decay-free teeth. Restorative services Fillings: To repair your cavities and restore your tooth structure, dental fillings are the answer. Made from durable, natural-looking materials, they blend seamlessly with your smile while preventing further decay. Crowns: Damaged or weakened teeth, can be strengthened by dental crowns. They provide protection, and a natural look. Custom-made for durability and aesthetics, they enhance both the function and appearance of your teeth for a confident, long-lasting smile. Bridges: If you have missing teeth, we can apply dental bridges to restore your smile’s function and appearance. Seamlessly fitting, bridges improve chewing, speech, and alignment while preventing surrounding teeth from shifting out of place. Cosmetic dentistry Veneers: Thin, custom-made shells that enhance your smile, veneers cover imperfections like stains, chips, or gaps. They provide a natural, durable, and radiant look for a flawless, confident smile. Bonding: This quick, affordable solution is used to repair chips, cracks, or gaps in teeth. Using a tooth-coloured resin, it enhances your smile, restoring both function and appearance with minimal discomfort. Whitening: Our whitening services will give you back your brilliant smile by removing stains and discoloration. By using safe, yet effective treatments, we can enhance your teeth’s natural whiteness, boosting confidence and giving you a radiant, youthful appearance. Orthodontic treatments Braces: Dental braces are a great solution for correcting misaligned teeth. With metal or ceramic options available, braces gradually shift teeth into their proper position, correcting bite issues, enhancing oral health, and giving you a more confident, beautiful smile. Aligners: For a modern alternative to traditional braces, we recommend clear aligners. Custom-made to fit your teeth, the plastic trays gradually shift them into alignment. Aligners are conveniently removable, making eating and cleaning a lot easier. They provide a clear, convenient solution for achieving a straighter, healthier smile. Emergency dental care Toothache and Trauma Repair: If you have an urgent dental issue, we can provide immediate attention. From severe toothaches to fractures, our experienced team can quickly diagnose and treat injuries or infections, relieving pain and preventing further damage. Apply For Dental Finance We understand how unexpected outgoings can cause concern, which is why we have created affordable payment plans for our patients. We believe treatments should be accessible for all our Sunshine Coast residents. With payments starting at just $50/week, you can have access to the procedures you need, with added peace of mind. Our options also include CDBS, Payright, Zip Pay and early access to superannuation. Smile On Clinics are here to ease the burden your dental issues may create, so rest assured, we’ll find the perfect plan for you. Alternatively, if you have health fund coverage, you will be covered for a range of dental services, and with various plans to choose from, this financial support for healthcare can help you manage treatment costs and provide access to high-quality care while reducing out-of-pocket expenses. Start Your Oral Health Journey with Smile On Clinics’ Trusted Maroochydore Dentist With the very best orthodontic treatment Sunshine Coast has to offer, Smile On Clinics not only provides expert care but also prioritises your comfort, making each visit a positive experience. Whether it’s routine check-ups, cosmetic enhancements, or urgent care, our skilled dentist in Maroochydore builds trust through compassionate, personalised services. We take the time to listen, educate, and guide you toward maintaining a healthy, beautiful smile. When you choose our clinics, you’re not just improving your oral health – you’re investing in a lifetime of confidence and well-being. Schedule a consultation today and take the first step toward perfection. title: Dentist Tamworth | Comprehensive Dental Solutions
content: Tamworth Shopping Village, Unit 15/80 Robert StTamworth NSW 2340 (02) 6765 4104 tamworth@smileon.com.au www.tamworthdental.com facebook.com/yourtamworthdentist instagram.com/yourtamworthdentist/ At Your Tamworth Dentist, we strive for excellence in ethical patient care. Our gentle and experienced team are trained to ensure that the care of our patients is of the highest possible standard. If you are looking for friendly dentists in Tamworth with the latest technology, equipment, including a complete dental implant service, we would be delighted to hear from you. Opening Hours Monday to Friday: 8:30am – 5:30pm Saturday: CLOSED Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Your Tamworth Dentist at Your Service! What’s the most important thing to you when visiting the dentist? Professionalism? Safety? Skilled practitioners? Is it the reassurance of feeling comfortable the second you walk through the door? Well, here at Smile On Dental, you don’t just have to choose one, because we offer all of this and so much more. We are a trusted Tamworth dentist providing comprehensive dental care to Tamworth residents and beyond. Whether you’re young, old, or anything in between, we can cater for all your dental needs, no matter your current oral health status. Book an appointment with our wonderful team to see what magic we can work on you. Then stick with us at Smile On Dental. Comprehensive Dental Care for all We really do mean it when we say that we offer a wide selection of dental services. If you choose to visit our Your Tanworth Dentist, here are just some of the treatments you can expect: General dentistry General dentistry covers pretty much everything you think of when visiting the dentist. It includes your routine check-ups, preventative work, cleaning, fillings and wisdom tooth removal. Remember, booking regular appointments at your dental clinic will give your teeth the very best chance to remain healthy and attractive, so if you haven’t visited a dentist for a while, give us a call now! Cosmetic dentistry Individuals visit us for cosmetic work when their teeth are healthy but perhaps fancy a little makeover. We can use teeth whitening treatments, bonding or veneers to improve the overall look of your teeth. Restorative dentistry Have broken, chipped or missing teeth? Then our dentist in Tamworth can help. Depending on your situation, you may choose dental implants, crowns or bridges. If you’re not sure what’s best, then just give us a call! Orthodontics You may see our orthodontics team for teeth straightening services. We have a selection of variants to choose from depending on your requirements and budget. This includes fixed braces and clear aligners. Jaw alignment treatments will also be treated under this category. Teeth straightening If you’re dealing with crowded teeth, gaps, or bite issues, teeth straightening can make a world of difference. Our orthodontic options include both traditional braces and modern clear aligners, offering flexibility based on your lifestyle and goals. Straightening your teeth not only enhances your appearance but also improves your oral health, as properly aligned teeth are easier to clean and maintain. Veneers For those looking to refresh their smile quickly and effectively, veneer treatment offers a long-lasting solution. Veneers are ultra-thin shells bonded to the front of your teeth to correct issues like staining, minor chips, and uneven spacing. At our trusted Tamworth dental clinic, we create custom veneers that blend seamlessly with your natural teeth for a flawless, confidence-boosting finish. Dentures If you’re missing several teeth or need a full replacement, denture procedures can restore both function and appearance. We offer both full and partial dentures tailored to fit comfortably and securely. Our experienced dentists in Tamworth will work with you to ensure your dentures are natural-looking, easy to wear, and help you eat and speak with confidence again. Emergency dental care You’ve heard us correctly. We provide care during your dental emergency, whether you’re an existing patient or not! Simply call our hotline, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and one of our team will do their utmost to get you exceptional dental care in the quickest time possible. For more information regarding the full list of services provided at our Your Tamworth Dentist , please view our website. Expect One-of-a-Kind Treatment at Your Tamworth Dentist As an independently owned company, we are 100% dedicated to providing exceptional dental care for our patients. We ensure that our professionals are highly trained and use the most effective technology available, as we aim for the best outcomes possible for our patients. Our digital smile design feature lets you become part of the process, as this enables you to see your new smile on the screen before any work takes place. This allows us to work out any issues and set your expectations on what your new and improved smile will look like! At Smile On Clinics, no patient is treated in the same way, because unlike some other dental health providers, we actually take the time to understand your individual requirements. If you would like to take advantage of our consultations, then please do get in touch with us at our Your Tamworth Dentist clinic, where you will meet with one of our professionals to discuss your needs, goals and budget. Following this, a tailor-made treatment plan will be created to suit you. This means that you will receive the most appropriate care for your needs. Who could ask for more?! You’ll be Safe in the Hands of a Tamworth Family Dentist Providing quality dental care for our youngest patients is extremely important to us, as it prevents concerns such as tooth decay and teaches children proper oral health practices that they can take into adulthood. Another benefit of bringing your child to a Tamworth family dentist early on is that they can become comfortable with our practice and know what to expect during an appointment. Our friendly staff members will welcome your children with open arms, making them feel at ease with our inviting toys in our waiting room. We will explain in simple terms exactly what will happen during their time with us, and will also provide useful information around tooth brushing, the effects of too much sugar, and why visiting the dentist is important for their overall health and well-being. We also recommend that your child bring something from home, such as a toy or game, to help them feel even more secure at our dental practice. Once we have finished, we will give them a small reward to celebrate a job well done. Children deserve the best start in life when it comes to their oral health, and we believe that we at Smile On Clinics are most equipped to provide this. Multiple Payment Options – Including Health Funds We are happy to announce that we accept all mainstream health funds; however, if you are covering the cost of your dental treatments yourself, then we have several choices for you. We have some discounts available if you pay for your services in full, however, we do also provide a choice of handy payment plans to suit your circumstances. If you would like to discuss your options, please call our dental practice. Your Soon to be Favourite Tamworth Dental Clinic So, there you have it. If we haven’t convinced you to visit a Smile On Clinics dentist, Tamworth, or otherwise for your dental needs, then we don’t know what will! We do advise, however, for you to read our outstanding success stories on our webpage. content: 80 Albert StreetTaree NSW 2430 (02) 6551 5077 taree@smileon.com.au www.albertstreetdental.com.au Facebook Instagram Located in Taree on the NSW Mid North Coast, Albert Street Dental provides a cutting-edge, fully equipped dental practice, offering an exceptional experience that’s a refreshing change from the standard dental visit, much appreciated by our patients. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. An Experienced, Friendly, Local Dentist in Taree Looking for a local Taree family dentist you can trust? Smile On Clinics are at your service. Our practice is dedicated to providing top-quality dental care in an environment that will make you feel comfortable and welcome. With years of experience, we specialise in preventive, cosmetic, and restorative dentistry to keep your smile healthy and beautiful. Our orthodontics team in Taree takes the time to understand your needs, ensuring personalised care for every patient. It could be a routine checkup, teeth whitening, or advanced dental procedures – we’re here to help. As a proud member of the community, we’re committed to brightening the smiles of the Taree Residents with gentle, expert care. Always Welcoming New Patients At Smile On Clinics, we love welcoming new patients and making every visit a positive experience. Whether you need a smile makeover or expert routine dental care, our friendly team is here to help. We understand that visiting the dentist can be nerve-wracking, so we go the extra mile to create a warm, relaxing environment where you feel at ease. Our experienced team is passionate about providing top-quality procedures, using the latest technology and techniques to keep you smiling all day long. From children to adults, we welcome patients of all ages and tailor our treatments to your individual needs. Join our dental family today and let us help you achieve a confident, radiant smile. Offering A Complete Range of Dental Treatments At our Taree dental clinic, we cater to all your dental needs to keep your smile healthy and bright. From routine checkups and cleanings to advanced cosmetic and restorative procedures, our expert team provides exceptional care for all ages. Whatever your dental issues, we’re here to help: General Dentistry: We focus on maintaining your oral health with preventive, restorative, and routine measures. These services include regular checkups, professional cleanings, fillings, gum disease treatment, and cavity prevention. We also provide essential treatments such as root canals, wisdom tooth removal, and crowns to restore damaged teeth. Preventive care is a key part of our general dentistry, helping patients avoid serious dental issues through early detection. Regular trips to your dentist allow them to monitor your oral health, provide tailored advice, and in turn, you achieve a glowing, healthy smile. From fixing a toothache to offering cosmetic solutions like whitening, general dentistry covers all aspects of dental care. With expert treatment and guidance, you can maintain a confident, healthy smile for years to come. Comprehensive oral exams: Our comprehensive oral exams are essential for maintaining long-term dental health. These thorough evaluations assess your teeth, gums, jaw, and overall oral structures to detect potential issues early. During the exam, we’ll check for cavities, gum disease, bite alignment, and signs of oral cancer. X-rays may be taken to examine underlying structures, ensuring a complete diagnosis. Regular comprehensive exams help prevent small issues from becoming major dental problems, saving you time, money, and discomfort in the future. Our professional dentists will also review your medical history, discuss oral hygiene habits, and provide unique care recommendations. Jaw alignment treatments: If your jaw is misaligned, there are several treatments available to correct bite issues, improve facial symmetry, and relieve discomfort. Common treatments include braces, clear aligners, palatal expanders, and orthodontic appliances that gradually shift the jaw into the proper position. Treatment can last for a few months, with adjustments made regularly for gradual expansion and movement. If your case is more severe, a Taree dental surgeon may suggest surgical options like orthognathic (jaw) surgery to correct significant misalignment. Early intervention, especially in children and teens, can prevent long-term issues like difficulty with chewing or speech problems. Treatments will vary based on individual needs, and our team will tailor plans to ensure the best results. At Smile On Clinics, our techniques and use of technology make jaw alignment treatments more effective and comfortable than ever. Whether minor or complex, addressing misalignment can improve both function and appearance, leading to a healthier, more confident smile. Early intervention orthodontics: With early intervention orthodontics, we can work on guiding jaw and teeth development in children to prevent serious dental issues later. Also known as Phase 1 orthodontic treatment, it typically begins around ages 6 to 10 when your child’s jaw is still growing. Our treatments may include palatal expanders, space maintainers, or partial braces to correct bite problems, crowding, or misalignment before permanent teeth fully emerge. By addressing issues early, we can reduce the need for more invasive treatments, such as extractions or surgery, in the future. Early intervention also improves facial symmetry, chewing function, and speech development. Regular dental checkups can help identify if your child may benefit from early orthodontic care. Emergency Treatments: The Smile On Clinics dentist in Taree provides fast relief for sudden dental issues like severe toothaches, broken teeth, lost fillings, or infections. We know that dental emergencies can happen anytime, anywhere, and immediate care is crucial to prevent further damage and pain, which is why we offer treatments such as tooth extractions, root canals, repairs for chipped or fractured teeth, and treatment for abscesses or gum infections. If you experience intense pain, swelling, or bleeding, our emergency dental care can save your tooth and protect your overall health. Our expert practitioners use advanced techniques to quickly diagnose and treat urgent problems, ensuring you get the relief you need. Dental emergencies should not be ignored, and timely treatment can prevent complications and restore your comfort Book Your Appointment with Smile On Clinics Book an appointment today with a Smile On Clinics trusted Taree dentist and maintain optimal oral health. Our skilled and experienced dentists provide you with a proper diagnosis and treatments, preventing you from developing potential dental issues. With regular check-ups, you can keep your teeth and gums healthy, improving both your smile and overall well-being. When you choose Smile On Clinics, you’re choosing dentists with high qualifications and accessibility to the best care. Prioritise your dental health by visiting our Taree dental practice. Schedule your appointment today and experience exceptional dentistry. title: Dentist Balgowlah | Trusted Dental Care for the Whole Family
content: Dentists in Balgowlah We offer our patients exceptional service using the most advanced treatment and technology available. 4.8 Google review Book now Patient Stories Practitioners Our Closest Clinic: See below for the closest dental clinic we have to this area—making it simple for you to book an appointment nearby. White Space Dental I Manly Dentist Office Hours Mon 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Tue 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Wed 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Thu 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Fri 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Sat 8:00 am - 2:00 pm Comprehensive Dental Treatment for the Entire Family At our Smile On Clinic, our dentists in Balgowlah provide exceptional care for the whole family, providing a wide range of services to meet all your dental needs. Whether you need routine check-ups, orthodontic treatments (such as braces or aligners), or complex dental procedures like dental implants, root canal therapy, or wisdom tooth removal, we are committed to delivering quality services in our state-of-the-art facility. We believe that a beautiful smile can be achieved through excellent dental health care, and we offer the following services to help you reach your smile goals and ensure the functionality of your teeth: General Dental Care We specialise in general dental check-ups and cleanings, which are essential to looking after your oral health. During these sessions, we can detect early signs of dental problems such as cavities, gum disease, and bacterial infections. By identifying these issues early on, we can prescribe preventative treatments, so you can avoid more intrusive and expensive interventions in the future. We also offer root canal therapy to preserve damaged or infected teeth, as well as tooth extractions for teeth that cannot be repaired. For teeth that can be saved, fillings, crowns, and bridges can restore the strength, function, and appearance of your teeth. Additionally, our cosmetic teeth whitening services are designed to brighten your smile, helping you restore confidence and achieve a more vibrant, youthful appearance. Orthodontic Treatments Orthodontics is one of our commonly sought-after services. Whether you're after a straighter set of teeth or you need jaw alignment treatments, our experienced orthodontists in Balgowlah can help. Our Smile On Straighter clear aligners are a popular treatment option for adults and teenagers looking for a more discreet and comfortable way to straighten their teeth. To help you look after your brand-new smile after treatment, we provide retainers to ensure your teeth stay in their new positions. We also offer advanced orthodontic solutions, including palatal expanders for patients with overcrowding or crossbites, designed to widen the jaw and create more space for improved function. We promote early intervention to help prevent more complex issues in the future. Cosmetic Dentistry For patients looking to improve the appearance of their smile, we provide a range of cosmetic dentistry treatments. We offer veneers, whitening, and bonding to help correct issues with stained, cracked, or uneven teeth. Restorative Dental Care To ensure your smile is long-lasting, restorative interventions are essential. Our team is skilled in performing procedures such as fillings, crowns, and bridges to restore the function and appearance of your teeth. Whether you’ve lost a tooth due to decay, trauma, or for any other reason, we offer a variety of restorative services that are designed to help you smile with confidence again. Emergency Dental Care Dental emergencies can happen when you least expect them, causing pain and distress. We prioritise quick and effective treatment during a dental emergency. Whether you're dealing with a toothache, trauma repair, or other urgent dental issues, our Balgowlah dental clinic is here to help you get the relief you need as quickly as possible. Dental Implants Implants are one of the most effective solutions for replacing missing teeth. We offer high-quality dental implants to replace missing or severely damaged teeth. They are a long-lasting solution that looks, feels, and functions like natural teeth. If you are missing teeth and are interested in this solution, our Balgowlah dental practice can guide you through the process, from initial consultation to the final placement of your implants. Balgowlah Residents Trust Us to Look After Their Teeth Our commitment to delivering exceptional dental care and ensuring the best possible outcomes for our patients has made us a go-to choice for families and individuals in our local community. With our experienced team of dental professionals, state-of-the-art facilities, and personalised treatment plans, Balgowlah residents feel confident leaving their oral health in our hands. One of the key reasons why the people of Balgowlah choose Smile On is our dedication to providing comprehensive dental care. Our Balgowlah family dentist offers a wide range of services, from general dental check-ups and cleanings to orthodontic treatments and cosmetic procedures. Whether it's routine preventive care or more complex treatments, we ensure every patient’s needs are carried out carefully and precisely, allowing patients to receive the care they need under one roof. Our patients appreciate that we take the time to listen to their concerns and personalise their treatments to support their specific goals. Our warm and welcoming environment helps ease any anxieties, making dental visits stress-free. We build long-lasting relationships with our patients and prioritise their comfort and well-being. We invest in cutting-edge tools and use modern techniques to ensure that our treatments are efficient, effective, and as minimally invasive as possible. From digital X-rays to intraoral cameras and 3D imaging, we use high-tech equipment to ensure we offer accurate diagnostics and prescribe the best treatment for you. This allows us to provide more precise care, whether we’re performing root canal therapy, dental implants, or orthodontic procedures. Our team stays up to date with the latest advancements in dental care through ongoing education and training to ensure patients receive the highest levels of care, backed by the most recent innovations in the field. Affordable and Accessible Dentistry for the Whole Family We understand that dental treatments can sometimes be a financial concern, which is why we are committed to providing affordable dental care options for our patients. We offer flexible payment plans to help you access the care you need without straining your budget. If you ever feel unsure about your financial options or need help navigating the process of accessing health funds, our friendly and knowledgeable team is always here to guide you every step of the way. We are dedicated to making your experience as stress-free as possible, both in terms of your dental treatment and the financial aspects of care. We take pride in offering personalised service to each patient, ensuring that you can focus on your oral health without worrying about your budget. At Smile On Clinic, we are here to help you find the best solution to your dental needs, with affordable payment options that work for you. If you're looking for a dentist in Balgowlah, call us today to schedule your appointment. We look forward to helping you achieve and maintain optimal dental health! The quality care you deserve, delivered with a personal touch Smile On Clinics comprises of a network of premium dental practices located across the Central Coast, the Hunter Valley region and Sydney. Our Use of Technology Our dental team wants to ensure you have the best experience possible when you are here at our dental surgery, and technology is one way we can provide that. Dental technology not only means our dentists can make earlier, more accurate diagnoses, but often, treatment is less invasive as well. This often translates to less time in the dental chair for our patients. REQUEST AN APPOINTMENT WITH US We can't wait to see you at the clinic. New patients feel free to choose a time that suits you online, while existing patients, please call to fast-track your next appointment. Our general dentistry services include: Thorough oral exams to check the condition of your teeth and gums General dental check-ups and cleanings to facilitate good hygiene Fillings for cavities to prevent exposed nerves from becoming infected Root canal therapy to try and save infected teeth Tooth extractions to prevent other teeth or the gums from getting infected Dental crowns and bridges to restore missing, weak, or damaged teeth Restorative and Cosmetic Dentistry If your oral health has been affected by decay, trauma, or missing teeth, our cosmetic and restorative services can help you regain function and boost your confidence with a brighter smile. Cleanings remove plaque and tartar, supporting gum and tooth health. Fillings: We use natural-looking composite fillings to restore decayed teeth and prevent further damage. Myths and Truths About Going to the Dentist 1. Myth: Dental visits are always painful. Truth: At Smile On, we always aim to reduce pain as much as possible, and we will confirm that you're comfortable to go ahead with treatment before we proceed to deliver your care. Thanks to advanced techniques and anaesthesia options, most procedures such as fillings for cavities, teeth whitening, and even dental implants are virtually pain-free. Our dental practice focuses on making your experience as relaxed and pain-free as possible so you can enjoy a stress-free visit. 2. Myth: You only need to go to a dental clinic if you have pain or a problem. Truth: General dental check-ups and cleanings are essential for maintaining good dental health and preventing future problems. Our dental clinic offers comprehensive care, from routine checks to more advanced treatments like root canal therapy or orthodontic treatments. Preventative dental care is key to avoiding invasive treatments in later life. 3. Myth: Dental care is expensive, and I can't afford it. Truth: At Smile On, we understand that quality dental care can be a significant investment, which is why we offer flexible payment plans to help manage the cost of treatments like dental implants, fillings, and orthodontic services. Plus, we work with various health funds to maximise your benefits entitlements and ensure dental care is accessible and affordable for everybody. 4. Myth: Cosmetic dental treatments, like teeth whitening or veneers, are only for celebrities. Truth: Cosmetic dentistry is accessible to everyone at Smile On. We offer a range of cosmetic services to help you achieve the beautiful smile you've always wanted. You should be aware that results may vary between patients, and you should always discuss your options with your dentist in Buderim before proceeding with any treatment. 5. Myth: Wisdom tooth removal is unnecessary unless you're in pain. Truth: While wisdom teeth may cause pain, their removal is often recommended even before problems arise. Impacted wisdom teeth can affect your oral health, ability to chew properly, and overall quality of life. Our dental practice offers tooth extractions to prevent future complications and will endeavour to reduce as much pain as possible. 6. Myth: Braces are the only option for straightening teeth. Truth: While traditional lingual braces and those made from metal or ceramics are effective, at Smile On, we offer a range of orthodontic treatments, including Smile On Straighter clear aligners and early intervention orthodontics for children, including palatal expanders to reduce overcrowding by creating more space in their mouths. Our team provides personalised recommendations based on your dental needs and those of your family, ensuring you all get the most comfortable and effective solution for a straighter smile. 7. Myth: I don't need to visit the dentist if I don't have cavities. Truth: Even if you're cavity-free, regular dental exams are essential for detecting other issues like gum disease, tooth sensitivity, or alignment problems that may not yet be causing you problems. At our dental practice we offer comprehensive oral exams to ensure your overall oral health is in top condition and to prevent future issues. 8. Myth: Root canal therapy is always painful and unnecessary. Truth: Root canal therapy is often a misunderstood procedure. At Smile On, we provide quality dental care for root canal treatments, which is known to relieve the pain caused by an infected tooth. The procedure is relatively painless due to effective anaesthesia, and it is the ideal solution to save your tooth from extraction, helping to preserve your smile. 9. Myth: Once I have dental implants, I'll need to avoid certain foods forever. Truth: When they're placed by our experienced team, implants offer a long-lasting, natural-looking solution for tooth loss. After a period of healing, implants are as strong as natural teeth, allowing you to enjoy all your favourite foods without restriction, providing a durable and functional solution for missing teeth. However, it's always recommended that you maintain a healthy, balanced diet and limit your consumption of sugary and fatty foods and beverages for your health in general. 10. Myth: I only need braces if my teeth are visibly crooked. Truth: Orthodontic treatments like braces, clear aligners, or jaw alignment treatments are about more than just cosmetic appearance. Misaligned teeth can lead to problems with bite, chewing, and even speech. Early intervention orthodontics can help to address these issues before they become more serious. 11. Myth: Tooth extractions require a long recovery period. Truth: While tooth extractions are sometimes necessary, the recovery period is typically short and easily manageable. With proper care and aftercare instructions from our Buderim dental clinic, our patients have reported a quick and smooth recovery. If it's a simple extraction or part of a larger dental plan (such as preparing for dental implants), we aim to ensure minimal discomfort and facilitate a fast recovery. 12. Myth: Dental crowns and bridges are only for people with major dental issues. Truth: Dental crowns and bridges are excellent solutions not only for people with severely damaged teeth but also for those who want to restore the function and appearance of their smile. Whether for restorative purposes or aesthetic reasons, these treatments can improve both the look and function of your teeth. 13. Myth: I can skip preventative dental care, like cleanings and sealants, if I brush and floss regularly. Truth: Even the most thorough brushing and flossing can't remove all plaque or tartar buildup. Preventative dental care, like professional cleanings and sealants, is vital for preventing cavities from forming and gum disease. At Smile On, we offer comprehensive dental check-ups and cleanings to maintain your oral health. 14. Myth: Dental emergencies are rare, so I won't need emergency care. Truth: Dental emergencies, such as toothaches, trauma, or broken teeth, can happen with little to no warning. We offer emergency dental care to quickly address these situations. Whether it's fixing a broken tooth or managing severe pain, our team is here to provide prompt and effective solutions. Supporting You to Cover the Cost of Dental Care We understand that dental care can come at a significant financial cost, which is why we offer flexible payment plans to help you manage the cost of your treatments, spread over a timeframe that works for you. Our team will work with you to find a plan that suits your budget, allowing you to access the care you need without causing you financial stress. In addition, we work with various health funds to make dental care even more affordable and accessible for everybody. The clinic’s knowledgeable staff assists patients in understanding their health fund coverage and maximising their benefit entitlement for each treatment. What Makes Us Unique? Smile On near Buderim goes beyond traditional dental care by offering a uniquely holistic approach to oral health and general well-being. Our focus at our dental clinic is creating a calm and welcoming environment where patients feel genuinely cared for from the moment they step through the door. Our patients report having a positive experience every time they visit our dental practice near Buderim because we always put them first. Our flexible appointment scheduling, including extended hours and emergency care availability, ensures that your dental health never has to wait. Our team is dedicated to making you feel valued, well-informed, and at ease throughout your consultations and treatment sessions. We also understand that dental anxiety is common, so we've developed calming techniques and offer sedation options to help nervous patients feel at ease. From children to adults, every patient receives a warm and supportive experience. We invest in the latest diagnostic equipment and the most advanced techniques to provide precise, effective care, all while minimising as much pain and discomfort as possible. Get in touch with us today to book an appointment—we're here for all your dental needs. The quality care you deserve, delivered with a personal touch Smile On Clinics comprises of a network of premium dental practices located across the Central Coast, the Hunter Valley region and Sydney. Our Use of Technology Our dental team wants to ensure you have the best experience possible when you are here at our dental surgery, and technology is one way we can provide that. Dental technology not only means our dentists can make earlier, more accurate diagnoses, but often, treatment is less invasive as well. This often translates to less time in the dental chair for our patients. REQUEST AN APPOINTMENT WITH US We can't wait to see you at the clinic. New patients feel free to choose a time that suits you online, while existing patients, please call to fast-track your next appointment. Teeth Straightening Achieve a beautifully aligned smile with our teeth straightening solutions, including braces and Invisalign. Dentures Replace multiple missing teeth with full or partial dentures, designed for comfort and functionality. Orthodontist for Kids Provide your child with expert orthodontic care for a healthy and properly aligned smile. title: Dentist Burwood | Comprehensive Dental Solutions
content: Shop 17, 11-15 Deane StBurwood NSW 2134 (02) 8069 7945 info@tailoredteeth.com.au tailoredteeth.com.au facebook.com/tailoredteeth instagram.com/tailoredteeth Tailored Teeth provides dental services in Burwood, Sydney, from our new age clinic that uses the latest in digital technologies for your healthcare requirements. Our Mission Is to Provide a Professional & Honest Approach to Health Care. Opening Hours Monday: 9am – 5pm Tuesday: 9am – 5pm Wednesday: 9am – 5pm Thursday: 9am – 5pm Friday: 9am – 5pm Saturday: 9am – 2pm Sunday: CLOSED Please note that while we endeavour to be open as much as possible during busy periods our office hours may vary on public holidays. If you have any questions about our opening hours please contact our team. Looking For a Dentist in Burwood? Smile On Clinics, trusted Burwood dentist providers, offer a wide range of dental services using the latest in dental technology to help you achieve the results you want. Read More Whether you’re looking for emergency dental treatment to take care of an aching pain or whether you want to enhance your natural teeth with aesthetic veneers, you can find it all at our Burwood dental clinic. When day-to-day life gets hectic, it can be very easy to put off visiting the dentist. However, the longer you go between check-ups, the more opportunity there is for your teeth to cause you trouble. Our friendly and professional team are here to set your mind at ease, incorporating state-of-the-art equipment to help you feel comfortable and cared for. Choosing a Smile On Clinics Burwood dental practice gives you the comforts of a small, local team as well as the benefits of an expanding brand, available across Australia. Our highly experienced team members prioritise the care of our patients, delivering excellence from the moment you walk through the door. What Dental Services Are Available to Burwood Residents? Here at Smile On Clinics, delivering quality dental care is our top priority. To help you maintain good oral health habits, we offer a wide range of dental health services that cover routine dentistry, cosmetic dental enhancements, and emergency assistance wherever necessary. Burwood residents will benefit from the latest technology to assist with corrective procedures such as clear aligners and orthodontic treatment, as well as having the option to choose sedation in cases of dental anxiety. We put our patients’ needs first and aim to keep you as comfortable and as happy as possible throughout your procedure. Services offered include: Children’s dentistry, helping your child to feel confident and proactive about their dental health. Preventative dental care, using our extensive experience to identify potential issues before they become especially concerning. Wisdom tooth extraction. Tooth restoration – chip repair, fillings, crowns, and bridges. Smile On Straighter clear aligners and orthodontic procedures to straighten teeth, using braces or aligners. Dental implants and dentures are tailor-made for you right here in our own Smile On Lab. Exclusive Teeth On Implants, applied by our industry-leading practitioners in this technology. Reference to high-end technology that ensures exceptional dental care from start to finish. General Dentistry Appointments at Burwood Dental Clinic Most general dental appointments are about covering the basics, as an accompaniment to good oral health practice at home. These appointments generally cover an inspection to identify potential concerns at the earliest possible stage, while providing professional cleaning services to keep plaque and other dental issues at bay. As part of your quality dental care, your extensive exam will give a comprehensive analysis of your current oral health and any remedial actions that may help to improve or maintain your current dental health. Your dentist will complete a report, including any x-rays or photographs taken as part of the examination, and will give you access to all recorded information to keep you informed of your health throughout. As a Burwood family dentist, we aim to help children feel at ease throughout their dental appointments, because we understand that positive experiences will help encourage your children to care for their teeth more enthusiastically. We offer children access to similar treatments to adults, including check-ups, professional cleaning and scaling, fluoride treatments, and – if necessary – teeth straightening options. Dental Treatments for Common Dental Concerns In Burwood Another common reason for dental visits centres around dental pain. This pain can be excruciating and begin suddenly, or it may be a ‘background’ pain that is ever present, but you live with it. In either case, it’s always best to visit a dentist when you experience dental pain. In almost every case, there is a reason behind these aches, and the longer you wait to investigate, the worse the situation can become. At Smile On Clinics, we will investigate the source of pain as a priority and make our professional recommendations for a course of treatment to help relieve the pain and protect against future instances. Common treatments can include wisdom tooth removal, and application of fillings and crowns, depending on the source of the issue. In cases where you have a chipped or cracked tooth, we can also rebuild the tooth or apply a veneer to tackle the problem before it requires a more invasive course of treatment to correct. Enhance Your Smile with Our Industry-Leading Orthodontist in Burwood Dentistry isn’t all about general maintenance or combatting painful conditions, it can also be about helping you feel comfortable and confident in your smile. Using digital smile design, a technological game-changer, you can now design your own smile. This puts full control in your hands, allowing you to choose the look that matches your aesthetic, rather than having a dentist choose for you. Whether you want to straighten your teeth using Smile On Straighter clear aligners, utilise selective or full mouth dental implants, or you need a fully reconstructed set of teeth via dentures, we’ll help you every step of the way. To begin, we would complete an extensive analysis of your current dental situation, using x-rays and images, to produce a digital recreation. From there, you’ll work alongside our highly experienced team of dental technicians and specialists to make the adjustments that you want to see in your smile. When your digital smile design is complete and you are fully satisfied with the final version, we’ll work to recreate your carefully curated smile. Our Friendly Dentists in Burwood Give You All the Support You Need Though no one aims for poor dental health, dentist anxiety is real. If you experience this, please let us know so we can give you all the support you require for your dental needs. Part of our commitment to providing exceptional dental care is ensuring that you are as relaxed and as comfortable as possible throughout. If your dental anxiety is very powerful, causing avoidance or even dental neglect, it can lead to compounded dental problems later on. To help you overcome this, we provide a range of options like happy gas, IV sedation or a general anaesthesia service so you can sleep soundly throughout your procedure. This service is popular and allows people to take care of their mental health and their oral health with as minimal disruption as possible. We keep you informed of your information and recommendations throughout, so you can make fully informed decisions at every stage of your dental health journey. Book Your Appointment at Our Burwood Dental Clinic Today Unlike many other dental practices, Smile On Clinics provides you with the care of a local dentist while giving access to the latest technology for exceptional care. We offer a wide variety of services and utilise our own Smile On Lab to create your tailor-made implants. Outsourcing your dental care can lead to miscommunication issues, delays, and other issues that can negatively impact your life. However, we prioritise keeping your care in-house. This means that there are multiple collaboration opportunities, allowing you to benefit from the extensive knowledge of many specialists, all working together as one team. We aim to deliver exceptional care every time you visit. To find out more, or to book your first Smile On Clinics dental appointment, you can send your request through our easy-to-use contact form – we look forward to seeing you soon.
